title: Cloud Solution Architect
description:
Är du passionerad och brinner för allt som har med ”molnet” att göra? Vi letar just nu efter en erfaren Cloud Solution Architect till vårt Architecture & BA team som är baserat i Malmö/Helsingborg och fokuserar på arkitektur, utveckling och bygga lösningar samt tjänster på två stora molnplattformar - AWS och GCP. Kunduppdragen kommer att vara i Skåne-regionen, men genom en global organisation som Capgemini får du möjlighet att samarbeta, utvecklas och växa med kollegor världen över.
  

  

Är du en molnutvecklare men delar en stark önskan att bli arkitekt? Då är du också välkommen att söka!
  

  

**Om rollen**  

Vi har två stora molnplattformar i fokus; AWS och GCP samt **fem** huvudområden av specialiseringar för teamet, varav detta är ett urval på delar du kommer arbeta med:


* Applikationsdesign och arkitektur i molnmiljöer
* Integrationer för molnbaserade tjänster
* Cloud DevOps och DevSecOps
* Lösningsarkitektur
DevOps verktyg; Git, Docker, Maven, Kubernetes  
* 

  

Med både bredd och djup erbjuder vi fantastiska möjligheter att förädla dina arkitekturfärdigheter, dela kunskap och utveckla dig tillsammans med skickliga kollegor i teamet.
  

  

**Din profil**

* +5 års erfarenhet av utveckling i tekniker så som Java, J2EE, Node.js, och React
* Du har hands on erfarenhet inom AWS eller GCP och kan bevisa det med motsvarande certifiering
* Goda kunskaper av Mikrotjänster - Utveckling och distribution av mikrotjänster i molnet inklusive containerisering, orkestrering och infrastruktur som kod med hjälp av Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, BlackDuck etc
* +2 års dokumenterade erfarenhet av att designa/implementera AI/ML-lösningar, med fokus på maskininlärning, djupinlärning, NLP och generativ AI
Du skriver och talar flytande svenska då det används i det dagliga arbetet  
* 

  

*Meriterande*

* Back-end erfarenhet inom följande: Python, TypeScript eller liknande
Front-end erfarenhet inom följande: Angular, Vue.js eller Jquery  
* 

  

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**  

Vi erbjuder dig en dynamisk arbetsmiljö med andra molnentusiaster inom Capgemini. Här får du möjligheten att arbeta i projekt med medelstora och stora internationella och multinationella kunder. Du har friheten att utveckla dig själv med hjälp av Capgeminis egen utbildningsplattform som bl.a. ger dig tillgång till all molnrelaterad utbildning. Berätta om dina ambitioner och vi ser fram emot att hjälpa dig att nå dem.  

  



* Föräldraförmån
* Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy
* Tech communities
* Mentorskapsprogram (som mentor eller mentee)
* Delaktighet i Capgeminis olika fokusområden; Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club, Art club etc.
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag & tjänstepension
* Bonusprogram
* Komptensutveckling i form av utbildningar och certifieringar
* Roliga och inspirerande personalevent
Företagshälsovård & sjukvårdsförsäkring  
* 
  

**Ansökan**  

Just nu har vi semesterperiod och hoppas även du njuter av en fin sommar! Vi kommer jobba löpande i denna rekryteringsprocess men vill nämna att det under semesterperiod kan dröja lite längre än vanligt i återkopplingen till dig som valt att söka. Stort tack för ditt tålamod!
  

  

#LI-ET1
  

**Om Capgemini**

Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
  

  

Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.
  

  

Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Senior SAP S/4HANA Finance Solution Architect
description:
**At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community.**  

  

**Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.**

**Your Role**

* **Lead the design, configuration, and implementation of SAP S/4HANA Finance, ensuring alignment with business requirements and best practices.**
* **Provide strategic advice and expertise to clients on SAP S/4HANA Finance solutions, including General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Asset Accounting, Controlling, and Treasury.**
* **Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to integrate SAP S/4HANA Finance with other SAP modules (e.g., SD, MM, PP, WM, PM) and external systems.**
* **Manage and mentor junior consultants, fostering their professional development and ensuring high-quality project delivery.**
* **Stay current with industry trends, the latest developments in SAP S/4HANA Finance, and emerging technologies to continuously enhance service delivery.**

**Your Profile**

* **Minimum 10 years of experience as an SAP S/4HANA Finance Consultant.**
* **Proven track record of successful SAP S/4HANA Finance implementations and optimizations.**
* **Strong understanding of financial processes and the ability to align SAP solutions with business objectives.**
* **Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.**
* **Experience of leading roles within global SAP S/4HANA implementations and optimizations.**
* **Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with clients and team members.**
* **SAP certification in SAP S/4HANA Finance is highly desirable.** **#LI-LB2**
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* **A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.**
* **Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.**
* **A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, modesty, Fun, and Boldness.**
* **A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.**

**Application**  

***In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.***

**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.**

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

title: ARAS PLM Solution Architect
description:
**The world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.**

**Your Role**  

**We’re looking for experienced ARAS PLM Solution Architects, who can bring value to the team and work as a key resource in our PLM projects. You will act as a creator of architectural design, defining system requirements and use cases to address overall business requirements, ensuring that the technical solution remains aligned and delivers value throughout any project. Location can be in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Helsingborg or Malmö.**  

  

* **Engage in customer Project Delivery Activities**
* **Analyze customer requirements and contribute to the configuration of PLM and other associated systems**
* **Conduct requirements gathering sessions and workshops**
* **Propose, plan, design and communicate architectural solutions with both Capgemini and Customers**
* **Produce written specifications that aligns with customer requirements for proposed solutions and configuration activities**
* **Identify issues and risks and provide input for solutions to key stakeholders**
* **Actively contribute to Pre-Sales Activities**
* **Development and presentation of custom solutions**
* **Participate in initial customer discovery**
* **Work with sales for budgetary proposals**

  

**Your profile**  

* **University degree, preferably in the fields of Computer Science or Engineering**
* **Demonstrated expertise in developing and deploying solutions based on ARAS**
* **At least 4 years of experience working in a Nordic country**
* **Proven IT development experience as well as experience of multi-cultural project teams, where parts are located off-site**
* **Excellent communication skills in English, both orally and written**

  

**Meritorious skills**  

* **Swedish communication skills, both orally and written**
* **Knowledge in .NET/Java frameworks**
* **Working knowledge of CAD tools, PLM-CAD-ERP and other enterprise integrations**

  

**We are looking for a team player who sees the team’s contribution as the ultimate goal. Additionally, you should be a self-going and communicative person with natural leader instincts, drive and independence.**  

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.**

title: Senior Data Engineer Göteborg
description:

------------------------

**Din roll**

Som Data Engineer hos Sogeti Göteborg kommer du att vara en del av vårt växande team inom Data och AI. Du kommer att använda din expertis för att modellera och analysera data, implementera och designa lösningar, samt bidra till att effektivisera kundernas verksamheter.

* Design och data warehousing.

title: Senior Gameplay Programmer
description:
Please note: As many of us are currently on summer vacation, the recruitment process will not start until mid-August.

*10 Chambers is a fully funded scale-up game studio backed by Tencent and based in the beautiful city of Stockholm, Sweden. We are an ambitious, creative, and collaborative team with a lifelong love for games.*

*We are now working on our next project, a cooperative heist FPS in a techno-thriller setting - Den of Wolves. Originated and directed by Ulf Andersson, the game designer of Payday 1 & 2.*


We are looking for a highly experienced **Senior Gameplay Programmer** with a lifelong love for games, the creativity to solve complex problems within a shared vision, and the drive to take ownership and deliver top-quality code.


At 10 Chambers, we are working in Unity and C#, which we find gives us a great balance between creative power, development speed, and quality. We can offer you a stimulating and challenging environment and constant opportunities to both apply and refine your skills.  

  

As part of a small, creative team responsible for delivering high-quality, player-facing systems, you will get to work across the stack rather than being limited to a single area.

* **Prototype, refine, and finalize** mechanics across a wide spectrum of gameplay, including core interactions, combat systems, and game logic.
* **Implement responsive controls and feedback** that make the game intuitive and satisfying to play.
* **Contribute to the stability and performance** of gameplay code through debugging, optimization, and best practices.
* **Profile and optimize gameplay systems** to maintain smooth performance on all target platforms.

**Required Qualifications**

* 8+ years of gameplay programming experience
* Demonstrated expertise in C#
* A great understanding of how to iterate to reach the design goals
* Strong collaboration skills
* Excellent command of English (Swedish is not a requirement)

**Bonus Qualifications**

* Experience with Unity
* Experience with ECS Architecture
* Experience with console titles

**Why join 10 chambers?**

* Be part of an ambitious team which also practices work life balance through working hours and generous health benefits
* Learn as part of a collaborative team and grow with a fast-expanding company
* Opportunity to make a real difference to the success of 10 Chambers


Note: The position is on-site in our Stockholm office  

  

**About us**


We want an open and inclusive work environment where everybody is valued, feels safe, is treated equally and with respect. At 10 Chambers we welcome everyone regardless of gender, transgender identity or expression, ethnicity, religion or other belief, disability, sexual orientation, or age. Today our team consists of 20+ different nationalities and the office language is English

*10 Chambers does* *not* *use* *AI to make the first selection of candidates*. HR and the recruiting manager read each application.

title: Gruppchef IT för Risk & Hälsa
description:
**Att jobba som gruppchef för Risk & Hälsa**


I din roll är du en närvarande chef som skapar förutsättningar för medarbetarna att prestera och leverera på sitt uppdrag, utvecklas och må bra längs vägen. En viktig del är att kommunicera med och inspirera dina medarbetare för att åstadkomma förändringar och förbättringar. Du kommer även att interagera och hantera verksamhetens olika intressenter och kravställare, vilket ställer krav på att kunna prioritera och fatta beslut. Rollen innebär att du har ett funktionsansvar för de applikationer som teamen förvaltar.  

  

Du kommer vara en del av ledningsgruppen inom försäkring IT. Skandia befinner sig i en större förändringsresa och vi i ledningsgruppen jobbar tillsammans med förändringsledning inom området.  

  

Gruppen IT Risk och Hälsa består av ca 25 medarbetare inklusive några konsulter fördelat över 4 stycken team. Teamen består av olika IT-kompetenser såsom; mjukvaruarkitekter, utvecklare, teamcoach och testare.  

  

I din roll kommer du exempelvis att arbeta med:  

  

* Leda arbetet med att utveckla, förbättra och implementera nya arbetssätt och processer.

  

* Arbeta med rekrytering och förändringsledning inom ditt kompetensområde.

  

* Proaktivt bygga förtroende med intressenter relevanta för gruppens arbete och måluppfyllelse.

  

* Bidra till utveckling och framdrift mot överordnade enhetsplaner och eventuellt verksamhets-/funktionsplaner för att säkra Skandias långsiktiga framgång.

  

* Ansvara för budget och resursfördelning inom din grupp.
  



  

**För att lyckas i rollen**


Du har tidigare erfarenhet av personalansvar/ledarskap, då det ger dig en god grund att stå på i rollen som gruppchef. Vi tror att en bra chef är orädd, nyfiken och kan prata med alla. Du är intresserad av dina medarbetare och tror på deras förmåga att själva ta ansvar och fatta beslut. I ledarrollen är det centralt att du agerar, engagerar och är tydlig i ditt ledarskap vilket är kärnan i Skandias ledarskapsprofil.  

  

Du har en vilja att vara med och påverka vår verksamhet och skapa resultat. Dessutom kräver det att du har goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.  

  

Du har en agil bakgrund inom IT och känner till SAFe metodiken och ramverket.

  

Meriterande för rollen är om du tidigare har arbetat inom försäkring-, bank- eller finansbranschen.

**Vad händer nu?**


Vi jobbar med löpande urval så tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag. I ansökan kommer vi att ställa ett antal urvalsfrågor som ligger till grund för första urvalet. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå intervjuer, tester, bakgrundskontroll samt digital referenstagning.


Om du har frågor kring rollen, vänligen kontakta rekryterande chef Jonas Rydensjö på jonas.rydensjo@skandia.se.


Om du har frågor kopplat till rekryteringsprocess, vänligen ta kontakt med Harald Brehmer på harald.brehmer@skandia.se.

*Vi tar nu en kort paus för sommarledighet. Urvalet påbörjas i augusti och vi kontaktar dig så snart vi är tillbaka.*


Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

**Mer om Skandia**


Vi är tillräckligt små för att du kan göra skillnad men tillräckligt stora för att du kan växa.


Vi är det ledande pensionsbolaget som tar ansvar. Hos oss är engagemang, ansvarstagande och en vilja att utvecklas några av de egenskaper vi värderar högst. Vi tror att samarbete tar oss längre än vad någon enskild person kan göra.


Vi erbjuder tjänstepension med förebyggande hälsoförsäkring för att våra kunder ska kunna bygga grunden till en trygg pension och vara friska på vägen dit. Vi erbjuder också bolån och sparande samt förenklar sparandet för våra kunder genom vår rådgivning.


Av våra närmare 2 miljoner kunder är 1,4 miljoner också våra ägare. Det är deras behov och intressen som vi tar tillvara i utvecklingen av Skandia.


Vi sitter inte inne med alla svaren, det är därför vi behöver din hjälp att lösa morgondagens utmaningar. Ditt bidrag kommer att märkas!

 **Ledarskap på Skandia**


För att möta nya utmaningar och utvecklas som ledare är det viktigt att vi stärker vårt ledarskap på Skandia. Vårt ledarskap definieras genom tre centrala områden: agerar, engagerar och tydlig som hjälper oss att navigera *framåt tillsammans*.

**Agerar** innebär att du som ledare är modig, röjer hinder, prioriterar, tar ansvar och hanterar svåra situationer.

**Engagerar** innebär att du som ledare inspirerar och utmanar, litar på och bryr dig om andra samt är nyfiken och fokuserar på lärande.

**Tydlig** innebär att du som ledare är kommunikativ och transparent, tydliggör förväntningar och följer upp samt ger och frågar efter feedback.

title: Product Owner
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform.
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards.
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products.
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* As a Product Owner for IT4IT, you serve as a strategic link between business stakeholders, IT leadership, and development teams—ensuring alignment between business strategy, IT objectives, and day-to-day execution.
* Define and evolve the product vision, with a strong emphasis on user-centric design and internal business value.
* Own and manage a clear, prioritized product backlog, balancing business needs with technical feasibility and cost efficiency.
* Lead the team in making informed trade-offs, while ensuring solutions remain secure, traceable (in line with ITIL/ITSM standards), and aligned with development and ITPMO requirements.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather feedback, validate outcomes, and ensure transparency in product delivery.
* Support the development of an internal-facing platform that is secure, cost-effective, and enhances traceability and governance across IT operations
* Certified SAFe Product Owner
* Proficiency with Atlassian tools, particularly Jira and Confluence, including configuration and administration
* Strong understanding of Agile and Scrum frameworks, with hands-on experience working in Agile teams
* Strong communication and stakeholder management capabilities
* Prior experience as a Product Owner in enterprise or IT service environments


 Benefits
   

  

* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: System Administrator and IT Support in Gaming
description:
**\*\*YOU MUST BE A CITIZEN OF THE EU OR EEA OR HAVE VALID WORK PERMIT TO WORK IN SWEDEN.** 




  





 Do you have a passion for gaming and IT operations? As a part of my3Twelve team, you will have an opportunity to be a System Administrator while helping with IT support for our clients to deliver experiences that meet the needs of customers. My3Twelve is seeking a proactive and skilled System Administrator with 2-3 years of experience in a corporate setting and who has a passion for gaming. The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining our IT infrastructure, ensuring system performance, and providing technical support to staff.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 


* Monitor and maintain servers, networks, and computer systems
* Install, configure, and troubleshoot hardware and software
* Perform regular backups and disaster recovery operations
* Ensure security and privacy of networks and computer systems
* Implement and maintain system updates and patches
* Coordinating with multiple clients, balancing various tasks, and navigating competing expectations
* Collaborate with other IT team members to resolve issues and improve system performance
* Be front line for technical improvements, including desktop support and troubleshooting hardware and software issues
* Perform the IT-related tasks for the on and off-boarding process (PC build-out, dev kit setup, etc.)
* Develop and own a process for managing requests including how issues are tracked, status is communicated, and resolved
* Identify, advocate for, and implement changes for the IT helpdesk process workflows based on requirements
* Work on both tactical (day-to-day) and strategic (long-term) projects
* Learn and implement best practices from other IT pros across organizations
* Lead the effort to evaluate and recommend hardware for various disciplines
* Document IT procedures and system configurations



  





 Qualifications
 


* 2-3 years of experience as a System Administrator or similar role. Service-minded, positive, can-do attitude
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
* Strong knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux)
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team
* Experience with network administration and network security
* Experience with configuring Azure virtual machines
* Experience with ITIL process-based helpdesk system
* Experience with a ticketing system such as JIRA Service Desk, Autotask, Kaseya, or comparable helpdesk systems
* Experience with corporate environments: AAD, AD, Directory Services, ADO, SharePoint, etc.
* Extensive knowledge of client hardware for setup, optimization, and troubleshooting
* Knowledge of authentication issues and resolutions
* Knowledge about basic network issues and resolutions
* Knowledge of printing and common issues



  





 Highly Recommended
 


* IT Operations/Engineering experience with a Game Studio
* Experience writing code/scripts in C# or PowerShell
* Experience troubleshooting client related issues in a corporate environment and the restrictions that comes with said environment
* Certifications such as CompTIA Network+, CompTIA Security+, or Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate are a plus.



  





 Pay: 25 000,00kr - 50 000,00kr per month

title: IT Systems Engineer
description:
**About Planet**
 Planet is a global provider of integrated technology and payments solutions for retail and hospitality customers.
   

  

 We create great experiences for the millions of people who use our payments, software, and tax-free solutions every minute of every day.
   

  

 Planet empowers its customers to deliver great customer experiences by combining payments and software in ways that drive greater loyalty, increase revenue and save time.
   

  

 Founded over 35 years ago and with our headquarters in London, today we have more than 2,500 employees located across six continents serving our customers in more than 120 markets.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As an IT Systems Engineer, you are responsible for our Data Center in Stockholm and for the maintenance, administration and installation of our server systems and our network. Do you already have experience in the areas mentioned and would you like to learn about new areas? You are willing to be part of oncall responsibility out of busines hours ? Then you've come to the right place!
   

  

 We work with agile development methods and use Atlassian Jira and Confluene.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Maintenance, administration & installation of server systems (Windows, Linux)
* Administration of the network infrastructure
* Administration of our VMware Virtualization environment
* Administration of the Data Recovery Tool veeam
* IT hardware preparation and provisioning
* Software distribution and software standardization
* Monitoring the IT landscape
* Creation, review and updating of IT documentation and the IT emergency concept
* Participation in IT projects and continuous improvement of the IT landscape
* ITSM-based way of working with Jira


**Who You Are**
* Completed training as an IT systems integration specialist, a degree in computer science or a comparable professional qualification
* Professional experience as an IT Systems Engineer
* Good knowledge of written and spoken English
* Ability to work under pressure and a high level of motivation
* Willingness to participate on our rolling oncall duty out of business hours
* A structured, independent and goal-oriented way of working
* A sense of responsibility for yourself, your actions and your professional progress
* Analytical skills and strong problem-solving skills
* Willingness to acquire new knowledge and participate in training and certifications
* The position requires on-call availability on a rotational basis, one week per month.


**Why Planet**
 Planet is an equal opportunity employer where diversity is valued, and all employment is decided based on qualifications, merit, and business need.
   

  

 Come and grow your career in the most exciting, fast paced technology market, with a business that delivers feel-good connected commerce.
   

  

 At Planet, we embrace a hybrid work model, with three days a week in the office.
   

  

 Reasonable accommodations may be made in order to allow for an individual to perform the essential functions of this role successfully.

title: IT Engineer
description:
**Start** 
 : ASAP
   

  

**Location** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Duration** 
 : December 2025
   

  

 We’re looking for a skilled IT Engineer to join our project onboarding applications to Single Sign-On (SSO) using IBM Security Verify Access (ISVA). You’ll work closely with application teams to ensure successful integration, applying your knowledge of access management technologies like OIDC, SAML, and web reverse proxy configurations.
   

  

**Key responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Guide application teams through onboarding their applications to IBM Security Verify Access (ISVA)
* Perform the actual onboarding in ISVA environments, from lower environments to production
* Troubleshoot onboarding issues and support teams in resolving technical challenges
* Collaborate closely with stakeholders to ensure secure and smooth SSO integration
* Work in an agile environment, contributing independently and proactively


**Job requirements**
**Requirements:**
* Solid technical knowledge of access management technologies, including:
* Single Sign-On (SSO)
* IBM Security Verify Access (ISVA)
* Reverse Proxy servers
* OpenID Connect (OIDC)
* OAuth2
* SAML Identity Federation
* Strong analytical mindset and ability to work in a structured, independent way
* Excellent communication skills in English (written and spoken)
* Previous experience working in agile teams; familiarity with SAFe methodology is a plus


**Application procedure**
 A Maandag® recruiter will assess your application as soon as possible to determine whether you are suitable for an open position.
   

  

**About The Company**
 If you are a good match, we would like to receive a CV in WORD format with motivation why you fit this assignment, your availability and any scheduled holidays.
   

  

 Why Maandag Nordic? With us, you’ll get the chance to really put your ideas into action. We offer a work environment where you can grow and learn through hands-on experience - trying things out, making mistakes, and improving.
   

  

 For more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. Because when people are truly in the right place, they can develop themselves, fulfil their dreams and go to work with fresh energy every day. The energy and power released in the process is a catalyst for growth for companies. We started in the Netherlands, but now we also help professionals and organisations in Belgium, Poland, Dubai and Sweden. Our extensive knowledge of different markets, coupled with our wide network, enables us to make perfect matches quickly.

title: IT-drifttekniker 24/7
description:
OM TJÄNSTEN
   

  

 Arbetsgivare: Svenska kraftnät Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning, heltid Placeringsort: Sundbyberg (Stockholm)
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag: 4 augusti 2025
   

  

 Arbetstider: Rullande 2-skift, dygnet runt (24/7), 12-timmarspass Kvalifikationer: Eftergymnasial IT-utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet. Minst 2 års erfarenhet av support i Windows- och/eller Linuxmiljöer. Serverdrift. Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
   

  

 Meriterande: Erfarenhet av ITIL, NOC, larmhantering och monitoreringsverktyg
   

  

 Arbetsplats: På plats i driftcentral
   

  

 Svenska kraftnät är en nyckelaktör i energiomställningen. Vår IT-division växer för att möjliggöra en fördubblad elproduktion och en fossilfri framtid. Med ny teknik ökar vi både infrastrukturens kapacitet och utvecklingstakten inom digitalisering och processer.
   

  

 Om tjänsten
   

  

 I rollen som IT-drifttekniker kommer du främst att ansvara för 1:a linjens incidenthantering, initial felsökning, fördelning av ärenden samt monitorering av flöden och larm. Du får en central position där du säkerställer och samordnar det som krävs för att garantera en hög driftsäkerhet. Tillsammans med kollegorna arbetar ni tätt tillsammans och agerar snabbt för att incidenter ska få en så liten negativ påverkan som möjligt.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Ta emot incidenter och skapa ärenden i ärendehanteringssystemet
* Åtgärda och/eller skicka vidare öppna incidenter till 2:a/3:e linjen
* Utföra enklare diagnostiseringar och återställa tjänster enligt instruktioner (Linux, Nätverk och Windows)
* Följa upp och återkoppla ärenden till såväl tekniker som anmälare.
* Arbeta enligt ITIL med fokus på incidenter i ärendehanteringssystemet samt förbättringsarbeten


 I rollen som IT-drifttekniker kommer du att bidra till att säkerställa en stabil IT-Driftmiljö för Svenska kraftnät. Här får du utmanas i att agera tillräckligt fort och hitta avvikelser innan det påverkar användarna.
   

  

 Tjänsten innebär rullande 2-skift det vill säga arbete både dag och natt. Alla pass är 12 timmar, antingen från kl 07.00 – 19.00 eller från kl 19.00 – 07.00. Arbetet sker på plats.
   

  

 Utvecklingsmöjligheterna är goda då IT-divisionen på Svenska kraftnät är under kraftig tillväxt och det finns möjlighet att byta erfarenheter med kollegor som verkat länge inom branschen.
   

  

 Som IT-drifttekniker tillhör du enheten IT-Driftcentral som består av 9 medarbetare som alla har samma roll. Du kommer att ha många kontaktytor, framförallt internt, men även externt i form av leverantörskontakter med mera.
   

  

 Om dig
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i den här rollen ser vi att du är en ansvarstagande person som ser ditt arbete som viktigt och vill samarbeta i teamet. Du är strukturerad i hur du tar dig an uppgifter samt möter deadlines. Som person har du är god känsla för service och vill genuint hjälpa alla intressenter. Vidare har du förmåga att både lyssna in, förstå och kommunicera väl för att prioritera rätt saker.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
   

  

 Vidare Ser Vi Att Du Har Examen Inom IT, Systemvetenskap Eller Motsvarande Utbildning Eller Arbetslivserfarenhet Som Vi Bedömer Likvärdig. Du Har Även
   

  

* Minst 2 års aktuell och relevant erfarenhet av arbete i 1:a eller 2:a linjens support av Windows och/eller Linux miljöer
* Erfarenhet inom serverdrift (t ex Linux/Unix, Windows)
* God förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska


**Vi Ser Det Som Meriterande Om Du Har**
* Arbetat enligt ITIL-processerna (Incident, Problem, Change, Request)
* Erfarenhet av monitorering och larmhantering
* Arbetat i en NOC/systemövervakningsfunktion


 Bra att veta
   

  

* Tjänsten är placerad i Sundbyberg (precis vid stationen), Stockholm
* Arbetet sker på plats
* Sista ansökningsdag är 2025-08-04, vi använder urvalsfrågor istället för personligt brev
* Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid med rullande skiftschema 24/7
* Förmåner | Svenska kraftnät


 Kontakta gärna rekryterande chef Mattias Granström, tel. nr. 010-350 92 46 alternativt ansvarig rekryterare Maria Sahlén, tel. nr. 010-489 20 27 (maria.sahlen2@svk.se). Fackliga representanter är Annika Ingeborn, SACO, 010-475 87 72 och Erica Midfjäll, ST, 010-475 87 31. Du når oss också via e-post: fornamn.efternamn@svk.se
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Innan ett beslut om anställning fattas kommer en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) att genomföras i de fall befattningen innebär hantering av säkerhetsskyddsklassificerade uppgifter eller deltagande i säkerhetskänslig verksamhet. Om anställningen avser befattning i säkerhetsklass kommer säkerhetsprövningen även att innefatta en registerkontroll och, i vissa fall, en särskild personutredning. För anställning på Svenska kraftnät kan det vara ett krav på svenskt medborgarskap i vissa befattningar. Med anställningen följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
   

  

 För mer information om säkerhetsprövning
   

  

 Svenska Kraftnät Arbetar För Att Främja Mångfald Och Motverka Diskriminering Och Ser Gärna Sökanden Med Olika Bakgrund Och Erfarenheter Till Våra Rekryteringar. Lär Känna Svenska Kraftnät Och Hur Det Är Att Arbeta Hos Oss
   

  

 Lär känna oss på Svenska kraftnät
   

  

 ANSÖK HÄR

title: Technical Business Analyst
description:
The Intelligent Automation initiative at the bank is currently in an expansive phase, during which new solutions and platforms are being analysed and researched. The current focus is on the Microsoft product family, including Copilot Studio, M365 Copilot, and Power Automate.
 



  





 The role:
 



 We are looking for a skilled Business Analyst to support our intelligent automation program by leading assessments, driving documentation efforts, and coordinating the enablement of Power Platform tools (Power Automate, Copilot Studio) in a regulated banking environment. This role will also be key in delivering workshops and building adoption across business units.
 



  





 Key responsibilities:
 



 •Lead risk, security, and compliance assessments for Power Platform and Azure-based solutions.
 



 •Collaborate with technical teams and stakeholders to gather requirements and validate solution approaches.
 



 •Develop training materials and conduct workshops to enable business users and IT stakeholders in using Power Platform tools effectively.
 



 •Track progress of approvals, remediation activities, and alignments with internal policies.
 



 •Support cross-functional alignment across infrastructure, security, legal, and business domains.
 



 •Facilitate stakeholder meetings, ensuring follow-ups and delivery of key outcomes.
 



  





 Soft skills:
 



 •Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
 



 •Strong organizational and time management skills.
 



 •Ability to translate technical concepts into business-friendly language.
 



 •Confident in leading meetings, workshops, and stakeholder engagements.
 



 •Adaptable and comfortable navigating complex regulatory environments.
 



  





 Qualifications:
 



 •Proven experience as a Business Analyst in a technology-focused or regulated industry environment.
 



 •Familiarity with Power Platform (Power Automate, Copilot Studio) is a plus, but not required.
 



 •Experience working with risk management, compliance, or audit teams.
 



 •Proficiency in process mapping, documentation tools, and business case development.
 



 •Understanding of cloud technologies (Azure knowledge is an advantage).gement methodologies (Agile, Waterfall, or hybrid).

title: IT-Support | Förstalinje
description:
**Job Description**
 Att arbeta på Coherent – det finns mycket positivt att säga om det! Coherent är världens största laserföretag. Mer än 27 000 medarbetare i över 40 länder arbetar med ledande fotoniklösningar för industriella, vetenskapliga och medicinska tillämpningar. De främsta talangerna inom området arbetar nu sida vid sida med banbrytande teknologier som sätter standarden på marknaden. Förutom många fördelar för våra kunder, erbjuder vi också mycket attraktiva möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling för alla medarbetare – i en tekniskt spännande miljö. En mycket kollegial atmosfär, professionalism och internationellt samarbete präglar vår arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter och ansvar**
* Arbeta på plats med förstalinjessupport i vår renrumsproduktion och på våra kontorsplatser.
* Hantera klienthårdvarans livscykel: beställning, mottagning, inventering och konfiguration av stationära datorer, bärbara datorer och tillbehör.
* Koordinera reparation och återställning av klienthårdvara med varierande ålder och operativsystem.
* Patcha nätverksuttag, vitlista och domänansluta produktionssystem och tillbehör.
* Hantera och tillhandahålla mobiltelefoner och abonnemang samt supportera lokala mobila tjänster och lösningar.
* Hantera skrivare och konferensrumsutrustning.
* Onboarding, offboarding och användaradministration.
* Samarbeta med kollegor både lokalt och internationellt, inklusive team i Europa, Indien och USA.
* Bidra till lokala och globala IT-projekt med fokus på hög servicekvalitet och kundnöjdhet.


**Krav**
 Vi tror att den ideala kandidaten har tidigare erfarenhet från en liknande miljö, gärna inom industri- eller tillverkningssektorn. På Coherent präglas vår kultur av professionalism, en kollegial anda och internationellt samarbete.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer och erfarenhet**
* Erfarenhet från liknande roll, gärna inom industri eller tillverkning.
* God organisationsförmåga och förmåga att samarbeta i en snabbföränderlig miljö.
* Djup kunskap inom installation, felsökning och återställning av klienthårdvara.
* Gedigen kunskap om Microsofts operativsystem och programvaror (O365, SCCM m.fl.).
* Språkkunskaper: Flytande i både engelska och svenska.


**Vad vi erbjuder**
* En tekniskt stimulerande arbetsmiljö med goda utvecklingsmöjligheter.
* En stöttande, professionell och internationell arbetskultur.
* Ett innovationsdrivet företag i framkant.


 Om du är en motiverad IT-specialist som trivs i en samarbetsinriktad, innovativ och dynamisk miljö, uppmuntrar vi dig att ansöka och bli en del av vårt team i Järfälla.
   

  

**About Us**
 Coherent is a global leader in lasers, engineered materials and networking components. We are a vertically integrated manufacturing company that develops innovative products for diversified applications in the industrial, optical communications, military, life sciences, semiconductor equipment, and consumer markets. Coherent provides a comprehensive career development platform within an environment that challenges employees to perform at their best, while rewarding excellence and hard-work through a competitive compensation program. It's an exciting opportunity to work for a company that offers stability, longevity and growth. Come Join Us!
   

  

**Note to recruiters and employment agencies:** 
 We will not pay for unsolicited resumes from recruiters and employment agencies unless we have a signed agreement and have required assistance, in writing, for a specific opening.

title: Business Analyst
description:

 The role:

This role will also be key in delivering workshops and building adoption across business units.
 



  





 Key responsibilities:
 



 •Lead risk, security, and compliance assessments for Power Platform and Azure-based solutions.
 



 •Collaborate with technical teams and stakeholders to gather requirements and validate solution approaches.
 



 •Develop training materials and conduct workshops to enable business users and IT stakeholders in using Power Platform tools effectively.
 



 •Track progress of approvals, remediation activities, and alignments with internal policies.

title: Data Analyst and system maintainer to Financial Crime Prevention area in SEB
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Financial Crime prevention, whether it is to combat fraud against our customers, protecting the bank from money laundering or perform sanction screening is central not only to SEB but for the society as such. If you are interested in working with our solutions regarding sanctions screening, continue reading!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 In this role you will work as data analyst in the FCP Screening team. We are maintaining and developing a bought system used for sanctions screening of SEB customers and transactions. You will work with analyzing data and help the team maintain our solution.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
* Experience with Python, Tableau, SQL or other similar tools and technologies.
* It’s meriting if you have previous experience working with solutions within financial crime prevention, sanctions screening, payment or banking in general.
* You have an analytical mindset and an ability to solve complex technical problems.
* You enjoy working with new technologies, encourage and drive change and continuous improvement in teamwork, tools and processes.


**What We Offer**
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Long-term stability
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Agile and modern ways of working


**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

**Ready to join?**
 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than
 **2025-07-31** 
 . If you have questions about the position please contact Talent Acquisition Partner, Rasmus Hallberg, at rasmus.hallberg@seb.se.

title: Information Technology Security Architect
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Computer and Network Security
description:
**IT-säkerhetarkitekt/IT-säkerhetsspecialist med inriktning mot försvarssektorn** 




  





  





 Vi erbjuder en viktig och stimulerande tjänst där du dagligen bidrar till att skapa ett säkrare Sverige tillsammans med ett trevligt och erfaret team inom säkerhetsområdet.
 



  





 Vi drivs av att stötta våra nationella och internationella kunder med säkerhetskompetens och kännetecknas av ledorden; glädje, kompetens och engagemang!
 



  





 Nu söker vi ytterligare en medarbetare för att komplettera vårt team som jobbar mot Försvarsmakten och försvarsindustrin.
 



 Har du erfarenhet av en eller av flera roller som; IT-säkerhetarkitekter eller IT-säkerhetsspecialister inom försvarssektorn? Du kan du vara aktuell för oss!
 



  





 Dina uppdrag kommer bestå av att kravställa, granska eller komplettera säkra IT lösningar så som system, produkter eller mjukvara.
 



  





 Kvalifikationer
 


* Vana att jobba självständigt och i grupp samt vara resultat- och leveransinriktad
* Erfarenhet av att jobba inom Försvarsmakten eller försvarsindustrin
* God förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska
* God förmåga att tänka utifrån kundens behov och perspektiv
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom området



  





 Kvalifikationer för ämnesområden. Har erfarenhet av minst 4st områden nedan:
 


* Server (Windows, Linux, VM-ware)
* Cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP, Private Cloud)
* Klientmiljöer för Mac, Windows och Linux
* Nätverksteknik (Switchning, Brandväggar, Routing, Wifi mm)
* Säkra lösningar (PKI, kryptering, VPN, CIS mm)
* Design av system inkl. säkerhetskomponenter. Framtagning av arkitektur och design inkl. lösningsförslag för tillämpningar
* Kunskap om vilka metoder en angripare kan använda sig av för att påverka eller ta över IT-system
* Hot och riskanalyser
* Erfarenhet av teknisk granskning av system och komponenter
* Kravfångst, kravanalys och kravnedbrytning
* Standarder, regelverk och processer inom säkerhetsområdet så som svenska KFS 3.1, ISD, Signalskydd samt utländska standarder och regelverk så som NATO, BSI, MCSS och Common Criteria



  





 Meriterande
 


* God erfarenhet av utvecklingsprocesser
* Internationella standarder (NIST, ISO 27000, m.fl.)
* Erfarenhet av konsultroll
* Någon eller några av följande informationssäkerhetcertifieringar: CISSP, CRISC, CISM, CSSP eller annan Cloud eller plattformsspecifik certifiering.



  





  





 JAMSEC AB är en oberoende konsultbyrå som är experter inom informationssäkerhet, Säkerhetsskydd och Säkerhetskultur.
 



 Våra kunder är verksamma inom sektorerna; Försvar, Telecom, Energi, Konsult, Stadsnät, Infrastruktur m.fl.
 



  





 Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan!

title: Chief Information Officer Airline Tech
company_industry: Travel Arrangements, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Software Development
description:
As Chief Information Officer Airline Tech, you will lead the digital transformation of TUI Airline, driving innovation, operational excellence, and customer satisfaction through cutting-edge technology. This global leadership role is pivotal in aligning airline operations with the broader TUI Group technology strategy, ensuring seamless integration, efficiency, and resilience across all systems. You will be at the forefront of shaping the airline’s digital agenda, enabling smart airports, connected aircraft, and AI-powered solutions that enhance both performance and sustainability. As a key member of the management team, you will influence strategic decisions, foster a high-performing tech culture, and ensure TUI Airline remains a leader in digital aviation.
   

  

*Application Closing Date: 15th July (Please note that due to a high number of applications we might need to close the role earlier than the application closing date - so don't delay!)*
**About Our Offer**
* Competitive senior level renumeration package
* Very flexible working conditions (“trust-based working hours” + mobile/home working)
* Pension schemes and healthcare options
* Generous holiday entitlement & discounts


**About The Job**
* Lead TUI Airline's technology strategy, positioning us as a digital innovator while ensuring alignment with TUI Group vision and regulatory compliance.
* Spearhead our digital transformation through innovative initiatives that enhance customer experiences and operational efficiency, implementing AI solutions, smart airports, and data-driven strategies.
* Strategically manage a sizeable technology portfolio, optimising resources and driving efficiencies while delivering exceptional technology services.
* Ensure reliability, performance, and cybersecurity of mission-critical airline systems through advanced threat intelligence and proactive defences.
* Collaborate with Supplier Management & Procurement to manage relationships with key technology suppliers, ensuring service excellence and competitive advantage across our technology ecosystem.
* Build and lead a lean, high-performing technology team, fostering innovation and technical excellence.
* Provide strategic technology counsel to TUI Airline leadership, translating complex technical concepts into clear business opportunities.


**About You**
* You bring extensive senior leadership experience in technology management, within the airline or travel industry.
* You have a proven track record of leading large-scale digital transformation initiatives and managing substantial technology budgets.
* You demonstrate strong experience in building strategic relationships with technology vendors, and leading and developing high-performing teams.
* You possess deep knowledge of airline operations and systems.
* You're a forward-thinking leader with excellent stakeholder management skills and the ability to influence at executive level.
* You thrive in rapidly changing technological landscapes with a passion for innovation and emerging technologies.


 From a workplace to a place to belong. At TUI we embrace diversity, equity, and inclusion, encouraging everyone to come as you are, because together, our potential is limitless.
   

  

 We are committed to supporting candidates with disabilities and impairments so if you require any support, please do let us know.

title: Unit Manager - Cyber Defence Center
description:
**Job Description**
 H&M Group is transforming the way it addresses the continuously evolving and complex cyber security threats and risks. To do this we have a Tech Centre focused solely on managing Cyber Security for all our brands and majority investments.
   

  

 Within this Cyber Security Tech Centre, we have a Cyber Defence Center (CDC) that is a key security function at H&M Group, which aims to detect and respond to threats to our data or technology systems, 24 x 7. The CDC has 3 teams located both in Stockholm and India, and consists of Cyber Defence Analysts, Attack Surface Reduction Analyst and Cyber Defence Engineers. The CDC also leverages the best-in-class security technology and security providers.
   

  

 This role reports to the Chief Technology Risk Information Officer (CISO).
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Lead and manage the Cyber Defence Center, ensuring effective coordination and collaboration among cyber defence teams.
* Develop and implement comprehensive cyber security strategies to protect the organization's digital assets.
* Provide leadership and technical guidance to managers of cyber defence teams, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
* Enable strong organizational health by making sure that your employees prioritize both deliveries as well as own competence development.
* Oversee the identification, assessment, and mitigation of cyber threats and vulnerabilities.
* Ensure compliance with relevant cyber security regulations and standards.
* Own and manage the cyber incident response and recovery processes, including coordination with stakeholders.
* Monitor and analyze cyber security trends and emerging threats to proactively address potential risks.
* Collaborate with other departments to integrate cyber security measures into business processes and initiatives.
* Prepare and present regular reports on the status of cyber security initiatives to senior management.
* Manage the units’ budget and monitor its financial effectiveness.
* Formal staff responsibility, including salary review, performance dialogues and support in individual development plans and competence needs.
* Contribute operationally, where necessary.


**Qualifications**
* Minimum of 10 years of experience in cyber security, with at least 5 years in a leadership role.
* Proven track record of managing and leading cyber defense teams.
* In-depth knowledge of cyber security frameworks, standards, and best practices.
* Strong understanding and a hands-on approach to threat intelligence, risk management, and incident response.
* Strong communication experience with demonstrated ability to influence people, even at senior levels, and ability to communicate in a timely and clear way
* Ability to coach others in a way that enables them to grow professionally and to increase their performance
* Experience setting and handling resource allocation budget.
* Experience with handling difficult situations both in uncertain circumstances as well as in employee related matters.
* Good at balancing striving for speed, reducing complexity, and focusing on the outcome
* Experience in managing complex cyber security projects and initiatives in a global scale
* Exceptional leadership skills, with the ability to develop and grow your colleagues in complex environments.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ability to work under pressure and handle multiple priorities.
* Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or equivalent.


**Additional Information**
 This is a fulltime permanent position. The role is
 **based in our office in Stockholm, Sweden** 
 .
   

  

 Apply by sending in your
 **CV in English** 
 as soon as possible. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
 At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

**Company Description**
 H&M Group is a family of brands; H&M, COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET and Afound. At H&M Group, our people are the driving force behind our commitment to creating meaningful growth and more sustainable lifestyles. Help us re-imagine fashion and together we will re-shape our industry. Learn more about H&M Group here.

title: Spontanansökan
description:
**Kort om oss**
 Linklaters LLP lämnar juridisk rådgivning till världens ledande företag, sponsorer och finansiella institutioner i de mest komplexa transaktionerna och ärendena. Med 31 kontor i de främsta affärs- och finanscentra, levererar Linklaters en unik service till klienter över hela världen. Läs mer om oss på www.linklaters.com eller lyssna på vår podd här.
   

  

**Vem kan söka?**
 Detta är en annons skapad för dig som antingen är:
   

  

* intresserad av ett extrajobb vid sidan av dina studier, eller
* nyligen eller inom kort avslutar dina juridikstudier eller tingsnotariat och är intresserad av en heltidstjänst som biträdande jurist.


 I de fall där vi inte har en specifik annons ute kan du använda denna annons för att visa ditt intresse för en eventuell anställning hos oss.
   

  

*Eftersom denna annons avser spontanansökningar kommer vi endast att återkoppla till de sökande om ett behov uppstår, och då till dem vars profil stämmer överens med våra krav.*
 Vid frågor, vänligen kontakta Marie Lundqvist, HR Advisor.

title: Front Office Receptionist
description:
**Company Description**
 Radisson Hotel Group is one of the world's largest hotel groups with ten distinctive hotel brands, and more than 1,460 hotels in operation and under development in 95+ countries. The Group’s overarching brand promise is Every Moment Matters with a signature Yes I Can! service ethos.
   

  

 People are at the core of our business success and future. Our people are true Moment Makers and together we bring the culture, spirit, environment and opportunities that empower you to be your best, every day, everywhere, every time. Together, we make Every Moment Matter.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Are you ready to elevate the guest experience from check-in to check-out and everything in-between? Say Yes I Can! and be a part of our dynamic world of Moment Makers.
   

  

 We are currently seeking a
 **Receptionist** 
 to join our vibrant team. At Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel, we are in search of individuals who go beyond the resume – those with character, skills, talents, and a passion for creating memorable experiences.
   

  

 As a
 **Receptionist** 
 you bring an unmatched level of dedication, a focus on delivering exceptional service, and a genuine passion for creating positive guest experiences to our dynamic Front Office Team.
   

  

 Our
 **Receptionists** 
 love the hustle and bustle of life! It’s not just about check-in and check-out. It’s about everything in-between
   

  

* You will be our guests’ superhero ensuring all aspects of the guest journey and experience are delivered to the highest level
* You will exude patience, empathy and have the personality to host the show
* As an integral part of the team, you will work proactively to ensure guest satisfaction and the smooth running of the front office department


**Qualifications**
* Flexibility and a positive, Yes I Can! Attitude
* An eye for detail
* Is a creative problem-solver
* Passionate about creating extraordinary service
* Ability to work as part of a team to ensure guest satisfaction
* Strong verbal communication skills
* Fluent in English
* Fluent in Swedish
* Likes having fun at work
* Experience in a similar position is beneficial but not essential


 Additional Information
   

  

**Why Join Radisson Hotel Group?**
**Live the Magic of Hospitality -** 
 Be part of a team that creates
 **exceptional experiences and memorable moments** 
 every day. Let your
 **Yes I Can!** 
 spirit shine as you bring hospitality to life.
   

  

**Build a Great Career -** 
 No matter your background or experience, we invest in your
 **growth, learning, and career development** 
 —helping you reach your full potential.
   

  

**Experience the Team Spirit -** 
 Join a workplace that’s
 **inclusive, fun, and meaningful** 
 . We celebrate diversity, support one another and foster a sense of belonging through our
 **Employee Resource Groups and inclusion initiatives** 
 .
   

  

**Lead with Your Ambition -** 
 Your ideas, passion and drive matter! We empower you to
 **make a difference** 
 —in hospitality, your community and beyond.
   

  

**Enjoy Global & Local Perks -** 
 No matter where you’re located, you’ll enjoy exclusive global benefits - like special hotel rates for you and your loved ones at our hotels worldwide. Plus, you’ll have access to local perks and rewards tailored to your country, making your experience even more rewarding!
   

  

**Join us in shaping the future of hospitality!** 
 If you’re ready to
 **bring your talent, energy, and passion** 
 , we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**Apply now and let’s make every moment matter.**
 We welcome applicants from all
 **backgrounds, abilities, and experiences** 
 . If you need any adjustments during the application process, please let us know.

title: IT Analyst
description:
**Start** 
 : ASAP
   

  

**Location** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Duration** 
 : March 2026
   

  

 We’re looking for an experienced IT Analyst, Data Analyst, or Business Analyst to join our team working with large datasets, data analysis, and IT solution design in the credit risk domain. You’ll act as the crucial bridge between business and IT, translating business needs into actionable solutions and ensuring high data quality and compliance within the software development life cycle (SDLC).
   

  

**Key responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Analyze large and complex datasets to extract meaningful insights supporting business and IT development teams
* Act as the interface between business stakeholders and IT teams, translating business requirements into high-level and low-level technical designs
* Create, review, and refine requirement specifications and solution designs
* Perform advanced data analysis using SQL to validate data against business rules and requirements
* Support and validate functional testing, including user testing (UT), system testing (ST), and end-to-end UAT
* Ensure solutions meet both business objectives and technical feasibility
* Participate in the full IT SDLC process, ensuring traceability from requirements through to testing and deployment
* Document processes, support test case creation, and verify results against expected outcomes


**Job requirements**
**Requirements**
* 8-10+ years of total IT experience, with at least 3-4 years working specifically as an Analyst (IT Analyst, Data Analyst, or Business Analyst)
* Strong background in banking or financial services
* Advanced data analysis experience using SQL
* Proven experience working within credit risk
* Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills; confident in managing stakeholders
* Solid understanding of IT SDLC processes and how analysis fits into each phase
* Comfortable working with large datasets and translating data into actionable insights


**Nice-to-have** 
 :
   

  

* Experience with SAS or Python for advanced data analysis
* Ability to independently convert business requirements into high-level and low-level solution designs
* Experience creating and executing functional test cases
* Ability to support testing phases, including UT, ST, and end-to-end UAT


**Application procedure**
 A Maandag® recruiter will assess your application as soon as possible to determine whether you are suitable for an open position.
   

  

**About The Company**
 If you are a good match, we would like to receive a CV in WORD format with motivation why you fit this assignment, your availability and any scheduled holidays.
   

  

 Why Maandag Nordic? With us, you’ll get the chance to really put your ideas into action. We offer a work environment where you can grow and learn through hands-on experience - trying things out, making mistakes, and improving.
   

  

 For more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. Because when people are truly in the right place, they can develop themselves, fulfil their dreams and go to work with fresh energy every day. The energy and power released in the process is a catalyst for growth for companies. We started in the Netherlands, but now we also help professionals and organisations in Belgium, Poland, Dubai and Sweden. Our extensive knowledge of different markets, coupled with our wide network, enables us to make perfect matches quickly.

title: Hybrid IT & Cloud Tekniker
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Har du erfarenhet av drift och support av Cloud och Hybrid-IT lösningar och vill fördjupa dina kunskaper inom området? Vill du vara en viktig del av en supportorganisation? Då vill jag lära känna dig!
   

  

 Jag heter Daniel Jastér och ansvarar för vår fantastiska Hybrid IT & Cloud gruppering på Telia Cygate. Vi söker en ny kollega i rollen som
 **Hybrid IT & Cloud Tekniker** 
 som vill vara med på vår gemensamma resa mot framtidens digitala infrastruktur!
   

  

**Är det här din nästa möjlighet?**
 I rollen som Hybrid IT & Cloud Tekniker kommer du att vara en nyckelresurs för våra kunder genom att lösa ärenden, utföra underhåll och utveckling samt vid behov assistera våra övriga grupperingar med dess komplexa problem. Du arbetar med konfiguration, övervakning och felsökning i våra kunders IT-miljöer med fokus på Cloud och Hybrid-IT.
   

  

 Exempel på vad du kan komma att göra:
   

  

* Microsoft 365-miljöer: Hantering av användarkonton, underhåll, övervakning, säkerhetskonfiguration, administration och felsökning.
* Windows Servrar och Active Directory Domain Services: Konfiguration av servrar, Group Policies, Hantering domänkontroller, Administration Certifikattjänster(PKI).
* Microsoft Defender och säkerhetslösningar: Administration, övervakning och konfigurering av Microsoft Defender. Konfiguration Advanced Threat protection.
* VMware-plattformar: Hantering, övervakning och felsökning av virtuella miljöer. Snapshots, säkerhetskopior och återställning av virtuella maskiner.
* PowerShell-skript Automatisering
* Backuphantering Veeam: Konfiguration, övervakning, schemaläggning, felsökning.
* Felsökning genom logganalys: Analysera server & klientloggar.
* Samarbete: Stöd till Servicedesk och övriga supportteam vid tekniska utmaningar och incidenter.


**Är det här du?**
 För att lyckas i rollen har du ett genuint intresse för kundbemötande, service och vill hjälpa våra kunder med dess tekniska utmaningar. Som person är du en lagspelare som vill känna tillhörighet i ett team. Du är lyhörd och öppen för att ta emot feedback, samt delar med dig av kunskap till dina kunder och kollegor.
   

  

 Din erfarenhet:
   

  

* Vi ser gärna att du har minst tre års erfarenhet inom IT-support
* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom IT ses som meriterande
* Meriterande med kunskap inom Windows server, Azure AD, Microsoft 365, Microsoft Defender, Active Directory Domain Services, SQL och Veeam Backup.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i en reglerad miljö samt installation av applikationer och anslutna enheter.
* Grundläggande kunskap om datorer, kringutrustning, operativsystem, nätverkskunskaper och VPN ses som starkt meriterande
* Flytande svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift
* På grund av krav från våra kunder behöver du vara svensk medborgare


**Varför Telia Cygate?**
 På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.
   

  

 Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.
   

  

 Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig påverkan!
   

  

**Låter det intressant?**
 Ta chansen och bli en del av vårt härliga team! Urval kommer att ske i början på augusti men tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Sista ansökningsdag är
 **2025-08-03**
 Flexibel placeringsort: Den här rollen kan utgå från valfri ort i Sverige. Men det är en fördel om du har närhet till något av våra stora kontor belägna i Stockholm HQ, Göteborg, Malmö, Norrköping, Växjö, Sundsvall eller Karlstad.
   

  

 Hybridarbete: Med denna tjänst erbjuder vi hybridarbete. Hybridarbete innebär att anställda arbetar både på kontor och på andra platser, som hemmet eller en annan utsedd plats. Det är en överenskommelse mellan arbetsgivare och anställd om hur mycket arbete som ska utföras på distans och hur ofta anställda ska besöka arbetsplatsen.
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta mig gärna, Daniel Jastér på daniel.jaster@cygate.se eller via LinkedIn.
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll är en del i våra rekryteringsprocesser. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Solution Architect Fixed Income for the Trading Technology Area at SEB in Stockholm
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Do you want to be part of strengthening SEB's market position in Fixed Income? We're currently looking for a Solution Architect to join our team. By joining Fixed Income, you'll become part of a leading player in the Fixed Income space within the Nordics, offering a broad product portfolio for investors, including interest-bearing instruments and associated derivatives, advisory services, and comprehensive financial solutions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Solution Architect within Technology Trading, you will be part of a team accountable for driving SEB's architectural agenda for Fixed Income. Your responsibility will be to evolve the architecture in line with the business objectives for Fixed Income with a focus on Cloud, Data, API and Security. You will be responsible for the driving the strategic agenda for the application portfolio, designing solutions, providing options, and detailing roadmaps towards the architectural target state.
   

  

 The architecture team within Trading consists of Solution Architects led by a Domain Architect. Together we strive to have a broad range of competencies and skills in technologies and business domain knowledge. We like to collaborate and team up to do great things together.
   

  

 But that’s not all – you’ll also be part of the Fixed Income Tribe, which includes teams from Trading Technology and Trading Services, all working together to support the Fixed Income business.
   

  

**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Experience in designing architectures that integrate diverse technologies and platforms
* Broad interest in various architecture domains, including business, application, information, and technology
* Expertise in designing and developing systems, with a focus on APIs, modularity, TTD, and data
* Experience working with regulations and directives
* Proven stakeholder management and communication skills, both with business and IT
* Strong drive, proactive attitude, and ability to take ownership and execute
* Strategic mindset with experience in developing roadmaps to guide the transition to target architectures
* Experience in cyber security and security architecture is merited
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Deliver world-class service to customers


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **July 30th, 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Andreas Höjgård, andreas.hojgard@seb.se ,
 **but we will not process applications via email.**
 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Enterprise Architect - Logistic, Fulfillment & Supply Chain
description:
**Job Description**
 We at H&M Group, have a vision to liberate fashion for the many. Our Enterprise Architecture team helps align and enable business and tech, provide holistic architecture direction and governance, balancing the long-term and the short-term. Using robust frameworks and best practices they support an effective and efficient tech delivery.
   

  

 To strengthen our team, we are now hiring more Enterprise Architects to further level up our support to business and tech in several areas.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Our architecture landscape is structured into key segments, with Logistic, Fulfillment & Supply Chain Solutions playing a pivotal role evolving the ecosystem with industry best practices in alignment with H&M Business goals.
   

  

 As an Enterprise Architect – Logistic, Fulfillment & Supply Chain, you will shape the future of our global supply chain ecosystem, ensuring seamless alignment between business strategy and technology execution. You will work cross-functionally to define, optimize, and evolve our Logistic & supply chain technology landscape across all touchpoints.
   

  

**You will:**
* Architect and lead the design of Logistic, Fulfillment & Supply Chain technology solutions, ensuring they align with business strategies and operational transformation initiatives to enhance transportation, trade, warehousing, order fulfillment, and returns processing.
* Identify cross-dependencies and guide the organization through business and technology capability changes, optimizing processes, data flows, and system integrations to enable seamless logistics operations.
* Advise and influence stakeholders, providing strategic guidance on investment decisions, assessing options, risks, costs vs. benefits, and business impact to drive informed prioritization.
* Shape the future of supply chain technology, evaluating new operating models, emerging technologies (AI, IoT, automation, digital twins, RPA), and industry trends to optimize business and logistics workflows.
* Continuously improve the tech landscape, reducing technical debt, modernizing the application portfolio, and enhancing end-to-end business value in supply chain and fulfillment ecosystems.
* Lead enterprise architecture practices, supporting architects, engineers, and delivery teams in defining current-state architectures, integration roadmaps, and solution designs to ensure scalability and resilience.
* Establish and maintain architecture governance, developing frameworks, templates, principles, and standards that facilitate best practices and foster an architecture-driven mindset across the organization.
* Ensure alignment of the Supply Chain & Fulfillment architecture with the broader enterprise landscape, setting intentional architecture roadmaps based on capability maps, value streams, processes, and business objectives.
* Drive business outcomes by facilitating and orchestrating segment architecture decisions, ensuring technology investments deliver measurable impact in logistics, fulfillment, and global trade operations.


**YOU’LL WORK WITH**
 As an Enterprise Architect, you will collaborate closely with business stakeholders, architects across different segments, ensuring seamless integration between Logistic, Fulfillment & Supply Chain with the broader enterprise architecture. You will work alongside Solution Architects, Enterprise Architects, and System Architects to define, optimize, and evolve our Logistic & supply chain technology landscape while ensuring alignment with enterprise-wide strategies.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with…
   

  

* A bachelor’s or master’s degree in engineering, computer science, technology, or a related field—or equivalent work experience. Certifications in Enterprise Architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF) are a plus.
* 15+ years of experience in software engineering, business technology, or related roles, including 10+ years in a Solution or Enterprise Architecture capacity.
* Proven experience in designing and optimizing supply chain and fulfillment solutions in global, consumer-goods organizations.
* Strong expertise in Transportation Management Systems (TMS), Warehouse Management Systems (WMS), Order Management Systems (OMS), and Trade Compliance Solutions.
* Hands-on experience with carrier integrations, last-mile delivery, reverse logistics, AI-powered planning, and IoT-driven warehouse automation.
* Experience in cloud-based supply chain platforms, API-driven ecosystems, and event-driven architectures to enable scalable and resilient logistics operations.
* Expertise in real-time visibility, predictive analytics, robotics, RPA, and digital twins to optimize fulfillment and logistics workflows.
* Strong ability to define and implement enterprise architecture principles, standards, and governance frameworks.
* Deep understanding of regulatory, environmental, and efficiency standards in global logistics and trade.
* Experience in architecture governance and formulating architecture principles, standards, guardrails etc.


**And People Who Are…**
* Strategic visionaries, shaping the future-state architecture to support business growth
* Collaborative partners, working across segments to ensure alignment and seamless integration.
* Analytical thinkers, who can assess complex systems and provide clear, actionable insights.
