title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Senior DevOps Engineer - Online Gambling (Casino & Sportsbook)** 




  





 Vi på
 **Boulder** 
 söker nu en erfaren
 **Senior DevOps Engineer** 
 för att stärka ett av våra mest teknikintensiva uppdrag. Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med både vårt interna team och vår kund, som just nu sitter tillsammans med oss på vårt kontor på Kungsgatan 71 i Stockholm.
 **Rollen är en heltidsanställning hos vår kund.** 




  





 Rollen handlar om att vara med och bygga en modern, säker och skalbar infrastruktur i ett snabbväxande företag inom Online Gambling (Casino och Sportsbook). Vi är flera specialister från Boulder som redan är engagerade i arbetet med att utveckla kundens produkt och nu söker vi dig som vill vara med och ta nästa steg i plattformsresan.
 



  





  





**Ditt uppdrag** 




  





 Som DevOps Engineer kommer du att ansvara för arkitektur, drift och vidareutveckling av en omfattande AWS-baserad infrastruktur. Du får möjlighet att arbeta med Infrastructure as Code, GitOps och Kubernetes i en miljö där prestanda, tillgänglighet och säkerhet står i centrum. Du arbetar nära utvecklingsteamen och bidrar till att möjliggöra snabba och säkra releaser i stor skala.
 



  





**Teknikmiljö (urval)** 




  




* **IaC & konfiguration:** 
 Terraform, Terramate, Helm
* **Cloud & container:** 
 AWS (EKS, Aurora, CloudFront, Route53, ACM), Docker, Istio
* **CI/CD & GitOps:** 
 ArgoCD, GitHub Actions, cert-manager
* **Observability:** 
 Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Jaeger, OpenTelemetry
* **Säkerhet & compliance:** 
 AWS Security Hub, GuardDuty, mTLS, WAF, GDPR, PCI DSS
* **Kostnadsoptimering:** 
 Infracost, auto-scaling, taggning och schemaläggning
* **Applikationsstack:** 
 Next.js, Strapi, PostgreSQL, Redis



  





**Vi tror att du har:** 




  




* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av DevOps- eller plattformsarbete i produktion
* Djup kunskap inom Terraform och molnarkitektur i AWS
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes (gärna EKS) och GitOps-principer
* Erfarenhet från reglerade miljöer som spel, finans eller hälsa
* Säkerhetsmedvetenhet och vana vid att arbeta med compliance-krav
* God kommunikationsförmåga och vana att samarbeta med både teknik- och affärssidan



  





**Bonus om du också har:** 




  




* Erfarenhet av Terramate och service mesh (t.ex. Istio)
* Arbetat med FinOps och kostnadsoptimering
* Intresse för mentor- eller ledarskapsroller
* Bidragit till open source eller deltagit i tech-communityn



  





  





 Vill du vara med och bygga skalbar, säker och banbrytande infrastruktur tillsammans med ett dedikerat team hos Boulder och vår kund? Då ser vi fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Operations Engineer Cloud
description:
**Om oss!** 




 Vimla är inte någon klassisk telekomoperatör. Vi är en del i Telenor-familjen som erbjuder mobiltelefoni med en twist! Vi tar kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på den svenska mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi tänker på kunden först och vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund hos oss.
 







 Vi är Vimla - mobiloperatören med bra vibrationer! Nu har du chansen att joina teamet i rollen som Operations Engineer Cloud, ta chansen och sök nu.
 







**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 I rollen som Operations Engineer Cloud i Vimlas tekniska driftsteam kommer du att vara en nyckelspelare med ansvar för att säkerställa en smidig och framtidssäkrad drift med fokus på vår molnplattform (AWS). Du leder förändringsprojekt från idé till genomförande och uppföljning, samtidigt som du samarbetar nära med kollegor inom hela organisationen; utvecklingsteam, arkitekter, leverantörer och partners.
 







 Vi moderniserar vår infrastruktur där AWS är en central komponent, och ditt bidrag blir avgörande för resan. Ditt ansvar innefattar även att underhålla våra interna tjänster, stötta kollegor i tekniska frågor och ingå i beredskap för interna system och integrationer. Rollen innebär stor påverkan och möjlighet att både bidra med idéer och utmana vårt sätt att arbeta.
 



  




* Hantera projekt, både interna och med partners och/eller leverantörer
* Samarbeta med alla inom Vimla för att förstå behov och prioritera projekt
* Arbeta med våra arkitekter för att säkerställa god systemutveckling
* Hitta och analysera problem som uppstår.



  





**Vi söker dig som har** 




 Vi söker dig som har en utbildning i datavetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet och god kunskap och erfarenhet av AWS-miljöer inklusive nätverksinfrastruktur (AWS VPC). Du känner dig trygg i Linux-miljö samt att arbeta med SQL (Oracle, Postgres), övervakningsverktyg som Splunk. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av telco-stacks, Shell-scripting eller Python ser vi det som ett stort plus. Vi ser gärna att du utmanar oss i vårt sätt att arbeta, och har med fördel erfarenhet av att genomföra förbättringar baserat på datadrivna beslut.
 







 Du är en problemlösare som trivs i mindre team där samarbete och eget ansvar går hand i hand. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och gillar att bidra med nya perspektiv. Framför allt söker vi dig som är nyfiken, ambitiös och vill vara med och utveckla både våra tekniska lösningar.
 







**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla** 




 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
 







**Ansök idag!** 




 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Telenor med Experis IT, som har lång erfarenhet av att rekrytera IT-specialister och chefer.
 







 Om du har frågor eller vill ha mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulterna Anki Snis på
 **anki.snis@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 70-377 59 69, och Carina Eyoma på
 **carina.eyoma@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 73-086 22 75.
 



 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
 



 Plats: Solna

title: Google Cloud Platform Engineer | SEB, Solna
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Join SEB’s Cloud Tribe and help shape the future of scalable, secure, and innovative products by advancing Public Cloud technologies. Take on this exciting challenge and make a real impact!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a
 **Cloud Engineer** 
 within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 25 highly engaged peers using new technology to develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance. Work closely with operations, maintenance, and security of the platform. Our delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for SEB’s developers to create a modern bank in the Clouds.
   

  

 As part of the Cloud Core Platforms, we offer a unique opportunity to be part of building the foundation of a paradigm change in banking. Being part of a multi-cloud tribe you will have the opportunity to gain skill and experience in multiple Public Cloud environments
 **.**
**To Thrive In This Position, We Believe You Have**
* Hands on experience with Google Cloud.
* Understanding other Cloud Platforms such as AWS and Azure.
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (such as Terraform), automation and CI/CD
* Experience with TypeScript, Bash and Python.
* Understanding of logging, monitoring and observability platforms.
* Knowledge of Agile principles
* Motivation and eagerness to learn


**What We Offer**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment: work-life balance, international working environment, hybrid work model, empowering and welcoming culture
* Growth culture: extensive training and learning opportunities, local and international internal mobility possibilities, long-term stability
* Modern environment: innovative company in forefront of technology, challenging, cutting-edge work, excellent office environment, agile and modern ways of working
* Additional monetary benefits: paid seniority vacation and volunteering days, allocations to Your pension fund, profit sharing programme, and additional health insurance


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **July the 30th, 2025.**
**Learn more about working at SEB: Technology | SEB**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Experienced IAM Engineer | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you passionate about new technology and making a difference? Join our digital transformation!
   

  

 The IAM Platform team is now looking for their new team member. The team consists of about 4 people. We work closely together and share the passion for great technology and creating a smooth engineering experience. Our group consists of people with different expertise, experiences, age and background. We have an open and friendly approach towards each other.
   

  

**About The Role**
 At this position within Hosting & Integration, you will be a part of a highly skilled team working with modern technology, security and developing of the IAM platforms, which are integrated in SEB DevOps toolchains. As a senior IAM Engineer you will create and evolve our IAM platform by investigating, developing, and implementing different technical solutions. This area is highly prioritized which creates many collaborations with various parts of the SEB organization. You will also be involved in SEB cloud journey.
   

  

 Your tasks will include designing, implementing and managing IAM solutions, deploying and managing the IAM Infrastructure, troubleshooting and resolving issues, ensuring compliance with security policies and best practices. In this role you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve the overall security posture of the organization.
   

  

**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* 5 years or more experience within IAM engineering.
* Experience with identity federation technology (ex. OpenID Connect, OAuth2).
* Experience with Single Sign-On and Multi Factor Authentication solution (ex. FIDO2).
* Hands-on experience with DevSecOps tools (e.g. managing platforms with Kubernetes, Git, Github actions).
* Experience of programming languages, such as Python, Java, go or Javascript.
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms.
* Attention to Detail.
* Critical Thinking .


**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 11th of August 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Anton Hänni via email at anton.hanni@seb.se
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB here** 
 : www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Project Manager
company_industry: IT System Design Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Project Manager – Digital Projects** 




  





 My client is an independent, member-based organization founded in 1922 who play a key role in developing national and international standards across sectors like construction, healthcare, consumer goods, environmental management, and quality systems.
 



  





**The Team & Technical Environment:** 




  





 Their development team consists of around 15 professionals. While the Lead Developer and Solution Architect are permanent employees, the rest of the team includes experienced consultants. The technical stack includes:
 



  




* **.NET 6** 
 ,
 **Azure Cloud** 
 ,
 **Azure DevOps**
* **SQL Server** 
 ,
 **REST APIs**
* No containerization currently, but strong use of Azure DevOps pipelines and tools



  





**The Role - Project Manager (Digital Projects):** 




  





 We're looking for a Project Manager with experience leading software/web/development projects through their full lifecycle. You won’t be managing the website project directly, but there are several strategic digital initiatives lined up across the organization.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Lead 1–2 digital projects simultaneously, each typically lasting 6–9 months
* Manage project teams of 3-5 FTEs, often cross-functional with business units like Finance or HR
* Ensure alignment between technical delivery and business needs
* Apply modern project management practices within software and digital environments
* Communicate effectively with both tech and non-tech stakeholders



  





**Ideal Candidate Profile:** 



* Proven experience managing digital/software projects end-to-end
* Strong familiarity with Agile or hybrid project methodologies
* Ability to collaborate across departments in a structured and communicative way
* Comfortable navigating technical environments like Azure DevOps and web/application development



  





 If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, excel at managing multiple priorities, and bring proven project management experience, apply directly, I’ll be in touch soon.

title: Senior Atlassian Engineer
description:
**We’ve signed up to an ambitious journey. Join us!**
*As Arrive, we guide customers and communities towards brighter futures and more livable cities, it isn’t a challenge just anyone could take on. Luckily, we have something to help us make it happen. Our people and our values. We Arrive Curious, Focused and Together. Just as our entire brand is inspired by the North Star, the shining light leading travelers to their destinations since time began, our values guide us. They help us be at our best. For our customers. For the cities and communities we serve. For ourselves. As a global team, we are transforming urban mobility. Let’s grow better, together.*
 We are looking for a talented Atlassian Senior Engineer to join our dynamic team in Stockholm and help us continue to build and scale our technology infrastructure.
   

  

**What This Role Will Be Focused On**
* Administering, configuring, developing and maintaining our Atlassian suite of products, including Jira, Confluence, and Bitbucket.
* Developing and implementing custom workflows, fields, screens, and other configurations to meet the evolving needs of our business.
* Building and managing integrations between the Atlassian suite and other third-party applications to streamline workflows and improve data consistency.
* Providing technical support and training to our employees to ensure they are maximizing the potential of our Atlassian tools.
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify areas for process improvement and implement solutions within the Atlassian ecosystem.
* Staying current with the latest Atlassian features, plugins, and best practices to ensure our systems are secure, scalable, and efficient.
* Developing and maintaining detailed documentation of our Atlassian configurations and processes.


**What You'll Bring**
* A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* 5+ years of experience in administering and customizing Atlassian products in a fast-paced environment.
* Proven expertise in Jira and Confluence, including a deep understanding of workflows, schemes, and permissions.
* Experience with scripting languages and the Atlassian REST API.
* Strong understanding of Agile methodologies and how to implement them within Jira.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
* The ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with a knack for explaining technical concepts to non-technical users.


**Why Arrive?**
* Our Core Values: We are built on a foundation of integrity, transparency, and a relentless commitment to our customers and our people.
* A Global Team: Be part of our growing international presence and collaborate with a diverse and talented team in a modern, centrally located Stockholm office.
* Growth and Development: We are invested in your professional growth and offer opportunities for continuous learning, mentorship, and career advancement within a global company.
* Comprehensive Benefits: We offer a competitive benefits package tailored for our Swedish employees, including a strong pension plan, wellness allowance (friskvårdsbidrag), and generous vacation time.


**About Us**
*Arrive, including brands like EasyPark, Flowbird, RingGo, ParkMobile and Parkopedia, is a leading global mobility platform. Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space. It’s about more than function, it’s about saving time and simplifying the experience of travel for everyone. Travel is more than a journey, it’s how you Arrive.*
 Arrive, including brands like EasyPark, Flowbird, RingGo, ParkMobile and Parkopedia, is a leading global mobility platform. Present in over 90 countries and 20,000 cities, the company helps people and decision-makers make smarter decisions about urban mobility and ease the experience of travel worldwide. Arrive delivers a unique combination of the core ingredients to make cities more livable: from smart payments and optimized car parks to data-driven traffic reduction and support for reinvestment in public transport and green space. It’s about more than function, it’s about saving time and simplifying the experience of travel for everyone. Travel is more than a journey, it’s how you Arrive.

title: Infrastruktur- & DevOps-konsult
description:
**Vill du jobba med moderna teknologier, infrastruktur som kod och CI/CD – samtidigt som du bidrar till ett säkrare och mer robust samhälle? Combitech i Stockholm söker nu en DevOps/Infrastruktur-konsult.**
**Vi erbjuder dig en roll som konsult där du får möjlighet att jobba nära våra kunder inom försvar, myndighet eller industri – alla med fokus på säkerhet, långsiktighet och teknisk höjd. Du kommer arbeta med automation, molnplattformar, containers och moderna pipelines i några av Sveriges mest intressanta teknikmiljöer.**
 Rollen
   

  

**I Rollen Kommer Du Att**
* Automatisera och optimera bygg- och driftsflöden med moderna DevOps-verktyg.
* Bygga och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines i t.ex. Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions eller Jenkins.
* Arbeta med containerlösningar (Docker, Kubernetes) och infrastrukturen kring dessa.
* Hantera infrastruktur som kod (IaC) med verktyg som Terraform eller Ansible.
* Implementera monitorering och loggning med Prometheus, Grafana, ELK m.fl.
* Skripta i Bash, PowerShell eller Python för att effektivisera återkommande moment.
* Bidra till säker och stabil drift i både test- och produktionsmiljöer.


 Vi söker dig som
   

  

* Har examen inom teknik/IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Har flera års erfarenhet av DevOps-arbete, CI/CD och molntjänster (AWS, Azure eller GCP).
* Är trygg med infrastruktur- och utvecklingsnära verktyg.
* Har god förståelse för nätverk (TCP/IP, DNS m.m.).
* Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och gillar att jobba i team.
* Bonus: erfarenhet från samhällsviktiga miljöer, säkerhet eller regulatorisk utveckling


**Då tjänsten innebär arbete som omfattas av försvarssekretess krävs det att du genomför och godkänns i en säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.**
**Urval sker efter annonsens utgång och vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!**
 Kom och gör skillnad!
   

  

 Vi arbetar främst med kunder inom försvarssektorn och industrin. Vi vill ständigt öka vår förmåga att möta och överträffa de krav som ställs i ett osäkert omvärldsläge. Vi är specialister på våra kunders unika behov och vi accelererar kundens utveckling genom att skapa team med rätt kompetens, tydligt driv och en passion för uppdraget. Hos oss får du vara med och utveckla ditt ledarskap för att möta kraven i framtidens samhälle.
   

  

 Vårt kompetensutvecklingsprogram Combitech GROW ingår som en naturlig del i din anställning. Vi ger dig möjlighet att växa i en företagskultur som uppmuntrar till såväl personlig som professionell utveckling, samtidigt som du arbetar i spännande och givande uppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss? Kolla in våra karriärsidor på vår webb!
   

  

 Kontakt/rekryterande chef: Petra Charlotte Arrenäs, petracharlotte.arrenas@combitech.com
   

  

 Vi undanber oss rekryteringssamarbeten.

title: Senior Solutions Architect - AWS
description:
**Description**
 Are you passionate about cloud technology and helping customers innovate? Join our AWS Solutions Architecture team and empower large enterprises across industries to innovate at speed and scale with cloud technologies.
   

  

 Solutions Architects work hand in hand with AWS customers to help them make the most of the Cloud. They are at the crossroads of business and technology and engage with organizations at all stages of cloud adoption. Solutions Architects are responsible for creating and presenting technical content and sharing best practices.
   

  

 They work to understand the customer's business needs and give prescriptive guidance on how to create business value with technology. They help customers validate their initiatives from ideation to proof of concept. Solutions Architects lead activities such as architecture reviews, white-boarding sessions, demos and technical workshops. They collaborate with other teams such as account management, professional services, industry experts, support, service teams and the AWS partner ecosystem.
   

  

 Amongst others you will be part of design and building reference architectures, proof of concepts and deploying workloads on AWS. Deliver thought leadership and recommendations on cloud architecture, migration, modernization and operation. Build strong technical relationships acting as the voice of the customer internally to influence AWS service roadmaps.
   

  

 Come build the future with us.
   

  

 AWS Global Sales drives adoption of the AWS cloud worldwide, enabling customers of all sizes to innovate and expand in the cloud. Our team empowers every customer to grow by providing tailored service, unmatched technology, and unwavering support. We dive deep to understand each customer's unique challenges, then craft innovative solutions that accelerate their success. This customer-first approach is how we built the world's most adopted cloud. Join us and help us grow.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 AWS values curiosity and connection. Our employee-led and company-sponsored affinity groups promote inclusion and empower our people to take pride in what makes us unique. Our inclusion events foster stronger, more collaborative teams. Our continual innovation is fueled by the bold ideas, fresh perspectives, and passionate voices our teams bring to everything we do.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Hands-on experience in designing and implementing AI / Data architectures for large scale enterprise environments.
* Background in Cloud Architecture, Systems Design, Software Development, Infrastructure Architecture, Data Engineering or DevOps across industries.
* Technical Degree (Computer Science, Maths, Engineering or equivalent) and/or relevant tech experience
* Experience in managing complex sales processes with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product and technical challenges


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Working knowledge of software development practices and technologies highly desired
* AWS Certifications


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch) - G54
   

  

 Job ID: A3021633

title: Data Infrastructure Engineer
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments and technology, with over 259 billion payments transactions flowing safely between consumers, merchants, financial institutions, and government entities in more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable, and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive while driven by a common purpose – to uplift everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 Make an impact with a purpose-driven industry leader. Join us today and experience Life at Visa.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 The Data Infrastructure team at Visa Global Open Banking provides the infrastructure, tools, and pipelines needed to support our organization’s data-driven applications. Our mission is to ensure that data is collected, transformed, and presented in a secure, timely, reliable, and cost-efficient manner.
   

  





 Key Responsibilities:
   

  




* Design, build, and maintain large-scale, cloud-based data services.
* Develop and maintain automated CI/CD pipelines and processes.
* Monitor and ensure the reliability and performance of the data infrastructure.
* Implement and enforce best practices for data security and compliance.
* Participate in an on-call rotation to support production systems.



 If you are a talented and passionate Data Infrastructure Engineer looking for a new challenge, we would love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team in central Stockholm!
   

  





 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your Hiring Manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**
* 3+ years of engineering experience.
* Proven success in designing, building, and managing large-scale, cloud-based services.
* Experience with containerization and orchestration (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
* Hands-on experience in an Infrastructure as Code (IaC) environment (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages, such as Java, Go, or Python.
* Experience with data warehouse tools (e.g., dbt, Apache Airflow).
* Strong understanding and experience with Cloud Security best practices.


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Operations Engineer Cloud till Vimla / Telenor
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Vimla är inte någon klassisk telekomoperatör. Vi är en del i Telenor-familjen som erbjuder mobiltelefoni med en twist! Vi tar kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på den svenska mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi tänker på kunden först och vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund hos oss.
   

  

 Vi är Vimla - mobiloperatören med bra vibrationer! Nu har du chansen att joina teamet i rollen som Operations Engineer Cloud, ta chansen och sök nu.
   

  

**Vad du kommer att göra**
 I rollen som Operations Engineer Cloud i Vimlas tekniska driftsteam kommer du att vara en nyckelspelare med ansvar för att säkerställa en smidig och framtidssäkrad drift med fokus på vår molnplattform (AWS). Du leder förändringsprojekt från idé till genomförande och uppföljning, samtidigt som du samarbetar nära med kollegor inom hela organisationen; utvecklingsteam, arkitekter, leverantörer och partners.
   

  

 Vi moderniserar vår infrastruktur där AWS är en central komponent, och ditt bidrag blir avgörande för resan. Ditt ansvar innefattar även att underhålla våra interna tjänster, stötta kollegor i tekniska frågor och ingå i beredskap för interna system och integrationer. Rollen innebär stor påverkan och möjlighet att både bidra med idéer och utmana vårt sätt att arbeta.
   

  

* Hantera projekt, både interna och med partners och/eller leverantörer
* Samarbeta med alla inom Vimla för att förstå behov och prioritera projekt
* Arbeta med våra arkitekter för att säkerställa god systemutveckling
* Hitta och analysera problem som uppstår.


**Vi söker dig som har**
 Vi söker dig som har en utbildning i datavetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet och god kunskap och erfarenhet av AWS-miljöer inklusive nätverksinfrastruktur (AWS VPC). Du känner dig trygg i Linux-miljö samt att arbeta med SQL (Oracle, Postgres), övervakningsverktyg som Splunk. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av telco-stacks, Shell-scripting eller Python ser vi det som ett stort plus. Vi ser gärna att du utmanar oss i vårt sätt att arbeta, och har med fördel erfarenhet av att genomföra förbättringar baserat på datadrivna beslut.
   

  

 Du är en problemlösare som trivs i mindre team där samarbete och eget ansvar går hand i hand. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och gillar att bidra med nya perspektiv. Framför allt söker vi dig som är nyfiken, ambitiös och vill vara med och utveckla både våra tekniska lösningar.
   

  

**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla**
 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
   

  

**Ansök idag!**
 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Telenor med Experis IT, som har lång erfarenhet av att rekrytera IT-specialister och chefer.
   

  

 Om du har frågor eller vill ha mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulterna Anki Snis på
 **anki.snis@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 70-377 59 69, och Carina Eyoma på
 **carina.eyoma@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 73-086 22 75.
   

  

 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
   

  

 Plats: Solna

title: Data Engineer
description:
We are seeking a
 **Data Engineer** 
 to join our dynamic team. You’ll play a key role in ensuring Schibsted Marketing Services has access to reliable, insightful advertising data. Working within a collaborative team of Data Engineers and Analysts, you will develop and maintain scalable data pipelines and warehouse solutions. Additionally, you will help transition our infrastructure, implementing Github Actions and dbt to support our shift towards a more modern architecture.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines from advertising systems to our data warehouse.
* Model data for efficient storage and query performance.
* Ensure seamless data extraction using Python and SQL.
* Collaborate with teams across Schibsted companies in Norway and Sweden, providing them with timely and accurate data insights.
* Support and guide stakeholders in defining data requirements for advertising performance.
* Implement Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) practices and optimise cloud infrastructure (AWS).


**Who You Are** 
 :
   

  

* Proficient in SQL and Python (for data extraction).
* Experienced with tools such as DBT, Airflow, and Github Actions.
* Skilled in building and maintaining scalable data pipelines and warehousing solutions.
* Familiar with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and infrastructure management tools.
* Collaborative, with the ability to meet and support stakeholders from various departments.


**Bonus Skills** 
 :
   

  

* Knowledge of BI tools such as Tableau.
* Experience or interest in the Media and Advertising industry.


**Why Schibsted?** 
 :
   

  

* Be part of a diverse team working on impactful projects that contribute to society.
* Collaborate with professionals across the Nordics in a company at the forefront of technological development.


**Important Note** 
 :
   

  

 You must have an existing work permit for this role.
   

  

  

  

**Recruitment Process** 
 :
   

  

* Phone Screening
* Non-technical Interview
* Technical Interview


*Schibsted is committed to diversity, inclusion, and creating a welcoming environment for all candidates.*
* Design, develop, and maintain robust data pipelines from advertising systems to our data warehouse.

* Ensure seamless data extraction using Python and SQL.

title: Databricks Champion
description:
*At Capgemini, you’ll have the opportunity to shape your career in a way that suits you, supported by a community of experts who inspire and empower you. We believe in reimagining what’s possible - using technology to build a more sustainable, inclusive world. Our Insights & Data team is at the forefront of this mission, delivering end-to-end Data & AI solutions across industries. With over 800 specialists in the Nordics, we leverage strategic partnerships with Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks, and Snowflake to scale Data & Analytics in the Cloud. Here, your expertise and perspective matter - join us in driving innovation and transforming industries with cutting-edge data solutions!*
**Your role**
 We are now seeking a passionate and experienced
 **Databricks Expert or Champion** 
 to join our dynamic team in Stockholm or Gothenburg. In this role, you will play a key part in driving Capgemini’s data, analytics & AI strategy forward using the Databricks platform. You will work hands-on with the latest tools in data ingestion, ETL, orchestration, and machine learning, while also contributing to solution design, architecture, and customer engagement. This is a role for someone who thrives at the intersection of technology, strategy, and communication.
   

  

 Capgemini has a strong and close collaboration with Databricks and was named EMEA Partner of the Year 2024 – a recognition of our customer growth, joint engagements, and technical excellence. As part of our team, you’ll help strengthen this partnership and guide organizations in unlocking the full potential of the Databricks platform.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key part in:*
* Design and implement high-performance data pipelines using Databricks and Apache Spark
* Build and maintain secure data lakehouses and data warehouses in Azure
* Integrate AI/ML models into data pipelines using Databricks ML and Azure ML
* Lead solutioning and architecture efforts – from whiteboard to production
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams including data scientists, analysts, and DevOps engineers
* Participate in presales, technical workshops, and customer presentations


**Your profile**
 We believe you are a senior data engineer or architect with a passion for building scalable, high-impact data solutions. You combine deep technical skills with strong communication and solutioning capabilities.
   

  

 You have:
   

  

* Proven experience designing and implementing data platforms using Databricks, Apache Spark, SQL, and Python
* Several years of hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure, including services like Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, and Azure ML
* A solid understanding of data architecture, including lakehouse design, data modeling, and governance
* Experience working in presales, technical workshops, and customer-facing presentations
* A collaborative mindset and the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions


**Databricks Champion – or on your way there**
 We are looking for someone who is either:
   

  

* An official Databricks Champion, recognized for their technical excellence and community contributions, or
* A high-level Databricks expert with the ambition and potential to become a Champion. With Capgemini’s support, network, and close partnership with Databricks, we’ll help you take that next step.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work
* hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We partner with names such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Databricks, which can equip you with valuable certifications in the latest technologies, if that is your ambition.


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
   

  

**Get The Future You Want** 
 | www.capgemini.com

title: Systems Design Engineer
description:

 Teledyne Technologies Incorporated provides enabling technologies for industrial growth markets that require advanced technology and high reliability. These markets include aerospace and defense, factory automation, air and water quality environmental monitoring, electronics design and development, oceanographic research, deepwater oil and gas exploration and production, medical imaging and pharmaceutical research.
   

  

 We are looking for individuals who thrive on making an impact and want the excitement of being on a team that wins.

 This position requires access to export-controlled information or items (i.e. regulated technology or technical data per ITAR/EAR US regulations). Applicants must be eligible to apply for and obtain the appropriate export control license from the U.S. Departments of State or Commerce.
   

  

 Teledyne and all of our employees are committed to conducting business with the highest ethical standards. We require all employees to comply with all applicable laws, regulations, rules and regulatory orders. Our reputation for honesty, integrity and high ethics is as important to us as our reputation for making innovative sensing solutions.

title: Senior Android Engineer
description:
**Hej, Truecaller is calling you from Stockholm, Sweden! Ready to pick up?**
 Our goal is to make communication smarter, safer, and more efficient, all while building trust everywhere. We're all about bringing you smart services with a big social impact, keeping you safe from fraud, harassment, scam calls or messages, so you can focus on the conversations that matter.
   

  

* Top 20 most downloaded apps globally, and world’s #1 caller ID and spam-blocking service for Android and iOS, with extensive AI capabilities, with more than 400 million active users per month.
* Founded in 2009, listed on Nasdaq OMX Stockholm and is categorized as a Large Cap. Our focus on innovation, operational excellence, sustainable growth, and collaboration has resulted in consistently high profitability and strong EBITDA margins.
* A team of 400 people from ~35 different nationalities spread across our headquarters in Stockholm and offices in Bangalore, Mumbai, Gurgaon and Tel Aviv with high ambitions.


**As a Senior Android Engineer** 
 , you will play a key role in the
 **Infrastructure team** 
 by improving developer experience, building and maintaining internal tools, ensuring CI/CD stability and efficiency and guiding app architecture. You will collaborate directly with backend and data infrastructure teams to build and enhance engineering platforms. As this role is primarily infrastructure-focused, your work will center around internal systems and tooling, rather than UI development or feature delivery within the app.
   

  

**The Impact You Will Create**
* Collaborate with other developers, data analysts and release managers to design, build and maintain robust infrastructure and tooling that boosts productivity of our Android engineering teams.
* Take full ownership of the Android developer experience, continuously evolving it by building and maintaining internal libraries, Gradle plugins and optimizing our CI/CD pipelines.
* Develop automation solutions that eliminate repetitive manual tasks for developers, freeing them to focus on feature development.
* Identify & execute large tech excellence initiatives to improve code quality & health.
* Set and maintain high engineering standards, ensuring infrastructure consistently meets developer needs.
* Share knowledge & drive the adoption of best practices for Android engineering at Truecaller.


**What You Bring In**
* 5+ years of experience in Android development.
* Strong passion for enhancing the developer experience, building internal tooling and reducing developer friction.
* Ability to work independently, proactively identify problems and autonomously drive your own work from conception to completion. You are expected to be a self-starter and take initiative.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, ability to diagnose complex technical issues and propose effective solutions.
* Solid understanding of the Android SDK.
* Proficiency in Kotlin, Coroutines, and Dependency Injection.
* Excellent communication skills in English.


**It Would Be Great If You Also Have**
* Experience with build and CI/CD systems, particularly Gradle and GitHub Actions.
* Experience with building Gradle plugins.
* Experience with building internal tools.
* Experience in investigating ANRs and analyzing bug reports. Analytical skills for finding root causes of crashes and other critical issues.
* Experience in debugging and profiling Android applications.
* Experience presenting on technical topics or advocating for best practices within an engineering organization.


**Life at Truecaller** 
 - Behind the code: https://www.instagram.com/lifeattruecaller/
   

  

**Sounds like your dream job?**
 We will fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate, so please send your application as soon as possible. We are excited to hear from you, don’t hesitate to apply!
   

  

 This position is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 We only accept applications in
 **English** 
 .
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A smart, talented, and agile team: An international team where ~35 nationalities are working together in several locations and time zones with a learning, sharing, and fun environment.
* A great compensation package: Competitive salary, 30 days of paid vacation, flexible working hours, private health insurance, parental leave top-up, pension contribution, Udemy membership to keep learning and improving, and free gym membership.
* Great tech tools: Pick the computer and phone you fancy most within our budget ranges.
* Office life: We strongly believe in in-person collaboration and follow an office-first approach while offering some flexibility. Enjoy your days with great colleagues with loads of good stuff to learn from, and a wide range of yummy snacks and beverages. In addition, every now and then, check out the playroom for a fun break or join our exciting parties and or team activities such as Lab days, Running team, movie nights in our cinema, or a Geek lunch. There’s something for everyone!


**Come As You Are**
 Truecaller is diverse, equal, and inclusive. We need a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences to keep building our great products. No matter where you are based, which language you speak, your accent, race, religion, color, nationality, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, etc.
 **All those things make you who you are, and that’s why we would love to meet you.**

title: SAS Developer
description:

 : ASAP

 : Stockholm / Finland

 : January 2026
   

  

 We are looking for a skilled SAS Developer to join our team supporting regulatory reporting and data integration processes in a leading banking environment. You will act as a bridge between business and IT, translating reporting and integration requirements into effective technical solutions.
   

  

**Key responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Develop and maintain data mappings and file-based data integrations using SAS Data Integration Studio
* Design, build and maintain regulatory reports (using SAS and Power BI)
* Collaborate closely with business stakeholders to understand reporting requirements and translate them into technical specifications
* Participate in testing activities and ensure high data quality and compliance with regulatory standards
* Contribute to continuous improvement of data integration and reporting processes in a SAFe agile environment


**Job requirements**
**Requirements**
* Strong experience with SAS programming and SAS Data Integration Studio
* Proven skills in data mapping and report development (SAS and Power BI)
* Experience with file-based integrations and structured testing practices
* Hands-on experience in financial sector projects, especially in regulatory reporting
* Knowledge of Swedish reporting requirements is a strong advantage

* Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively between business and IT


**Application procedure**
 A Maandag® recruiter will assess your application as soon as possible to determine whether you are suitable for an open position.

 If you are a good match, we would like to receive a CV in WORD format with motivation why you fit this assignment, your availability and any scheduled holidays.
   

  

 Why Maandag Nordic? With us, you’ll get the chance to really put your ideas into action. We offer a work environment where you can grow and learn through hands-on experience - trying things out, making mistakes, and improving.
   

  

 For more than 35 years, Maandag® has been at the forefront of empowering people and organisations. We not only help professionals get jobs, but also connect them with a future that matches their values, desires and ambitions. title: Översättare Engelska till Svenska - AI Tränare
description:
DataAnnotation är engagerade i att skapa kvalitativ AI. Gå med i vårt team för att hjälpa till att träna AI-chatbotar samtidigt som du får flexibiliteten att arbeta på distans och välja ditt eget schema.
 



  





 Vi söker en tvåspråkig professionell för att gå med i vårt team och lära chatbotar. Du kommer att ha samtal på både svenska och engelska med chatbotar för att mäta deras framsteg, samt skriva nya samtal för att lära dem vad de ska säga.
 



  





**Förmåner:** 



* Detta är en heltids- eller deltidsdistansposition.
* Du kommer att kunna välja vilka projekt du vill arbeta med.
* Du kan arbeta efter eget schema.
* Projekt betalas per timme, med start från 30+ USD per timme, samt bonusar för högkvalitativt och högvolymarbete.



  





**Ansvarsområden (både på svenska och engelska):** 



* Komma på olika samtal inom en rad ämnen.
* Skriva högkvalitativa svar när specifika instruktioner ges.
* Jämföra prestanda för olika AI-modeller.
* Forska och faktagranska AI-svar.



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 



* Flytande i svenska och engelska.
* En kandidatexamen (avslutad eller pågående).
* Utmärkta skriv- och grammatikfärdigheter.
* Stark forsknings- och faktagranskningsförmåga för att säkerställa noggrannhet och originalitet.



  





**Not: Betalning sker via PayPal. Vi kommer aldrig att be om några pengar från dig. PayPal hanterar alla valutakonverteringar från USD.**

title: Business Analyst – Technical
description:
The Intelligent Automation initiative at the bank is currently in an expansive phase, during which new solutions and platforms are being analysed and researched. The current focus is on the Microsoft product family, including Copilot Studio, M365 Copilot, and Power Automate.

 **The role:**


We are looking for a skilled Business Analyst to support our intelligent automation program by leading assessments, driving documentation efforts, and coordinating the enablement of Power Platform tools (Power Automate, Copilot Studio) in a regulated banking environment. This role will also be key in delivering workshops and building adoption across business units.

 **Key responsibilities:**

* Lead risk, security, and compliance assessments for Power Platform and Azure-based solutions.
* Collaborate with technical teams and stakeholders to gather requirements and validate solution approaches.
* Develop training materials and conduct workshops to enable business users and IT stakeholders to use Power Platform tools effectively.
* Track progress of approvals, remediation activities, and alignments with internal policies.
* Support cross-functional alignment across infrastructure, security, legal, and business domains.
* Facilitate stakeholder meetings, ensuring follow-ups and delivery of key outcomes.

 **Soft skills:**

* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
* Strong organizational and time management skills.
* Ability to translate technical concepts into business-friendly language.
* Confident in leading meetings, workshops, and stakeholder engagements.
* Adaptable and comfortable navigating complex regulatory environments.

 **Qualifications:**

* Proven experience as a Business Analyst in a technology-focused or regulated industry environment.
* Familiarity with Power Platform (Power Automate, Copilot Studio) is a plus, but not required.
* Experience working with risk management, compliance, or audit teams.
* Proficiency in process mapping, documentation tools, and business case development.
* Understanding of cloud technologies (Azure knowledge is an advantage).gement methodologies (Agile, Waterfall, or hybrid).

title: 3GPP Security Architect
description:
The world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your role**  

You will be responsible for designing and implementing cybersecurity frameworks and solutions to protect 5G core networks in line with 3GPP security standards.
  

*In this role, you will play a key role in:*  

* Leading the design and implementation of end-to-end cybersecurity architectures for the 5G core network, ensuring alignment with 3GPP security standards
* Applying in-depth knowledge of 3GPP security protocols for 5G networks, including security measures for user equipment (UE), access networks, and core networks
* Conducting comprehensive threat modelling and risk assessments for 5G core network services, identifying potential vulnerabilities and developing mitigation strategies.
* Developing and executing an end-to-end security strategy for the 5G core network, incorporating encryption, authentication, authorization, and data integrity mechanisms.
* Designing and implementing security controls for network slicing within the 5G core, ensuring isolated and secure environments for different service types and customers.
* Leading efforts to detect and respond to cyber incidents within the 5G core network, implementing advanced monitoring, logging, and alerting systems.
* Ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements, industry standards (e.g., ISO 27001), and 3GPP security specifications.
* Collaborating with network engineering, operations, and product teams to integrate security measures into the design, implementation, and deployment of the 5G core network.
* Documenting security architecture designs, risk assessments, and incident response protocols, reporting to senior management on the status of 5G core network security.
**Your profile**  

* Strong expertise in 5G core network architecture and 3GPP security standards.
* Experience in designing and implementing Cybersecurity solutions for telecom networks.
* Proficiency in 3GPP security protocols such as authentication, encryption, and key exchange.
* Hands-on experience in Threat modelling, Risk assessment, and Incident response.
* Deep understanding of Network slicing security, Encryption mechanisms, and Regulatory compliance (ISO 27001, GDPR, NIST, etc.).

*Note: You will be required to pass through SC Security Clearance if you are successful in this recruitment process, which is a condition of undertaking the role.***What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* Exposure to cutting-edge technologies in the 5G and cybersecurity domain, including professional certifications in cybersecurity and Telecom security.
**About Capgemini**  

Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.
  

Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Cyber Security Architect
description:
The world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your role**  

You will be responsible for designing and implementing cybersecurity strategies and solutions to protect the 5G Radio Access Network (RAN) in line with 3GPP security standards.
  

*In this role, you will play a key role in:*  

* Leading the design of security architectures for the 5G RAN, incorporating 3GPP security standards and related elements.
* Developing security mechanisms for air interface protection, signaling, and data confidentiality.
* Implementing and optimizing authentication, encryption, and integrity protection mechanisms specific to the 5G RAN
* Applying deep knowledge of 3GPP protocols to secure communication between mobile devices, base stations, and the 5G core network.
* Conducting threat modelling and risk assessments specific to 5G RAN, identifying vulnerabilities in the radio access layer, and proposing countermeasures.
* Assessing security risks in RAN architecture
* Ensuring air interface protection using techniques such as dynamic key management, mutual authentication, and encryption algorithms.
* Working closely with 5G core network security teams to ensure that security mechanisms in the RAN are seamlessly integrated into the end-to-end security of the mobile network.
* Collaborating with security operations teams to monitor, detect, and respond to security incidents affecting the 5G RAN.
* Developing incident response plans for security breaches within the radio access layer and providing guidance on mitigations for emerging threats.
* Leading the design and execution of security testing for 5G RAN solutions
**Your Profile**  

* Strong expertise in 5G RAN architecture and 3GPP security standards.
* Experience in designing and implementing cybersecurity solutions for telecom networks.
* Proficiency in 3GPP security protocols, such as authentication, encryption, and key exchange.
* Hands-on experience in Threat modelling, Risk assessment, and Incident response.
* Deep understanding of Radio interface security, Encryption mechanisms, and Regulatory compliance (ISO 27001, GDPR, NIST, etc.).
*Note: You will be required to pass through SC Security Clearance if you are successful in this recruitment process, which is a condition of undertaking the role.*

description:

-------------------

The world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. title: En digital kommunikationsstrateg till Medborgarskolan Stockholmsregionen
description:
Medborgarskolan finns över hela landet och våra kurser och kulturaktiviteter engagerar varje år närmare en miljon deltagare. Vår verksamhet är öppen för alla. Vår ambition är att stimulera till kunskapssökande, eget skapande och samhällsengagemang. Vi förenar trivsamma lärandeformer med höga krav på kvalitet och kompetens.  

  

Medborgarskolan Stockholmsregionen är en ideell förening som förutom traditionell folkbildning även bedriver förskola, grundskolor, gymnasier, eftergymnasiala utbildningar, yrkesutbildningar (YH-utbildning och KU-utbildning) samt företagsutbildningar.  

  

Läs mer om Medborgarskolan Stockholms verksamheter på www.medborgarskolan.se/stockholm  




**Bli nyckelpersonen som driver vår digitala kommunikation framåt!**
--------------------------------------------------------------------



Vill du kombinera strategiskt arbete med kreativt innehållsskapande och samtidigt bidra till att fler hittar sin väg till utbildning och folkbildning? Då kan du vara den vi söker.



Medborgarskolan Stockholmsregionen befinner sig i en spännande utvecklingsfas där synlighet, digital närvaro och varumärkesbyggande är högt på agendan. Som Digital kommunikationsstrateg får du en central roll i att skapa engagemang och driva kommunikationen i våra digitala kanaler.



Hos oss får du vara med och utveckla kommunikationen för en organisation som gör verklig skillnad – där folkbildning, utbildning och livslångt lärande står i centrum. Vi erbjuder ett varierat arbete, stort eget ansvar och en möjlighet att påverka.

  


### **Ditt uppdrag**



Du ansvarar för att utveckla och implementera vår digitala kommunikationsstrategi med målet att öka synlighet, intresse och engagemang kring våra skolor och vår bildningsverksamhet. Rollen kombinerar strategi, operativ produktion och samordning, där du arbetar nära både skolledning, verksamhetsansvariga och pedagoger.


**Exempel på ansvarsområden:**


* Utveckla och samordna kommunikationsstrategin med fokus på digitala kanaler.
* Planera, producera och publicera innehåll för webb, sociala medier och nyhetsbrev.
* Driva utvecklingen av vår skolkommunikation, allt från målgruppsanalys till kanalval och budskap.
* Omvärldsbevaka trender och utveckling inom digital kommunikation gällande utbildning och folkbildning.
* Projektleda kampanjer och kommunikationsinsatser, både interna och externa.
* Säkerställa inkluderande, tillgänglig och värdegrundsbaserad kommunikation.


**Vi söker dig som…**


* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av digital kommunikation – både strategiskt och operativt.
* Är van vid annonsering, sociala medier, SEO och nyhetsbrev.
* Har erfarenhet från utbildnings-, skol- eller ideell sektor, gärna i en projektledande roll.
* Behärskar relevanta verktyg som CMS, Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite och Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Uttrycker dig mycket väl i tal och skrift på svenska.
* Är van att arbeta datadrivet och kan mäta, analysera och utveckla insatser.
* Har erfarenhet av rörlig produktion, storytelling och varumärkesbyggande.


**Som person är du…**


* Strategisk och operativ och du trivs både med helhetsgreppet och det praktiska genomförandet.
* Relationsskapande och pedagogisk – du får med dig andra och kan tydliggöra kommunikationens värde.
* Självständig och initiativtagande – du ser vad som behövs och driver utvecklingen framåt.


**Meriterande om du även har erfarenhet av...**


* Komplexa organisationer eller förändringssituationer.
* Generativ AI inom kommunikation.
* Elevrekrytering.


Medborgarskolan är en ideell bildnings- och utbildningsorganisation med en humanistisk värdegrund. Vi vill vara den självklara mötesplatsen för människor som vill utvecklas och skaffa kunskap.

title: Senior Systems Engineer - HPE Aruba
description:
Senior Systems Engineer - HPE Aruba  


This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  

As a **Senior Systems Engineer** at HPE Aruba Networking you act as a technical expert and enable portfolio knowledge and execution. Your ability to combine technical know-how and market intelligence grants you a position as an ambassador and technical expert. You will be the driving force behind the overall portfolio knowledge in all dimensions within your assigned customer territory.


Client/customer relationship:

* Maintain excellent communications with customers and partners in assigned customer or expertise area (mainly in public sector)
* Represents HPE Aruba as a technical expert in customer and partner meetings, forums or other events
* Drives opportunities with effective consultative techniques
* Builds customer loyalty through becoming a trusted advisor
* Partners effectively with others in the account team to ensure customer satisfaction
* The role will require business travels in Sweden (around 1-3 days/week)


Solution Planning and Design:

* Building a strong technical expertise within certain areas of the Aruba portfolio
* Develop a good understanding of the overall Aruba portfolio
* Acquire at least one Aruba Expert certification
* Adapt proposal and design to customer requirements
* Establishes the validity of a solution and its components
* Identifies the growth path and scalability options of a solution for long term architectural positioning
* Articulate and clarify key aspects to implementation plans and setting expectations


Team collaboration:

* You are a team player who actively supports the account team with solution advice, proposals, presentations, and other customer communications.
* Analyzes and provides support to deals in the pipeline where needed.
* Transfers knowledge to peers via mentoring and actively participation in education programs.
* Understands the roles and effectively engages other teams and resources within the company and partners.
* Facilitates a smooth transition from sales to implementation projects and design


If you are…

* Fluent in Swedish and English which are the 2 working languages
* Holding an Engineering or University degree or extensive experience in designing and supporting complex enterprise networks
* Ideally having at least 3-6 years’ experience on the Solution Architect/System Engineer/Presales role, mainly acquired with a manufacturer and/or an integrator
* Excellent in communication, presentation and negotiation
* Having good knowledge on Aruba's latest technologies and solutions, as well as competitive solutions
* Able to understand technical innovations and trends, customer value chains and business requirements


Join us and make your mark!

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning (Inactive), Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health & Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal & Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Unconditional Inclusion**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

title: Teknisk kravanalytiker
description:
Soros söker nu en erfaren teknisk kravanalytiker till ett konsultuppdrag inom ett större molnmigreringsinitiativ hos en av våra kunder i försäkringsbranschen. Uppdraget har hög prioritet och genomförs i en komplex miljö där tidplanen är kritisk – en nyckelroll för dig som vill bidra till en strategisk förflyttning till Azure Cloud.

Om uppdraget

Du kommer att ingå i ett tvärfunktionellt team med ansvar för kravanalys kopplat till förflyttning av ett målsystem till Azure. Rollen innebär nära samarbete med systemtekniker, leverantörer och verksamheten.

Arbetsuppgifter:

Fånga, dokumentera och kvalitetssäkra funktionella och icke-funktionella krav

Stötta verksamheten med kravarbete enligt agila metoder

Leda workshops, bidra till tidsuppskattningar och testarbete

Skapa samsyn kring förändringsbehov och lösningar

Koordinera mellan IT, affär och externa parter

Kravprofil

Vi söker dig som har:

Minst 4 års erfarenhet som teknisk kravanalytiker

Tidigare erfarenhet av tekniska förflyttningar eller molnmigreringar

Vana av att arbeta i stora, komplexa organisationer med agila metoder

Förmåga att självständigt driva kravarbete från analys till implementation

Mycket god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska, i både tal och skrift

Meriterande:

Erfarenhet av migrering till Azure Cloud

Erfarenhet av agil kravmetodik (t.ex. Epics/User stories, SAFe)

Bakgrund inom försäkring eller finansiell sektor

Vill du ta nästa steg i en strategisk molnresa? Välkommen med din ansökan senast 4 juli!

title: BDR Internship — Do the Work, Learn the Game
description:
- Devoteam G Cloud is one of Google Cloud’s top partners in Europe. We help companies move faster with AI, cloud, and data — not with buzzwords, but with real delivery.


The Stockholm office is part of our Nordic setup — small, hands-on, ambitious. We don’t waste time with fluff. We focus on outcomes, we move fast, and we expect a lot.


If you want to be in rooms where work actually happens and decisions get made, this is that kind of team.

  
This internship is for someone who wants to build real sales skills — not for someone looking to just "gain experience."


You’ll be doing meaningful work that supports our sales pipeline. You’ll be writing messages, researching companies, and making first contact. You’ll be pushed, coached, and expected to improve.


**Here’s what you’ll actually do:**

* Research accounts and contacts — learn to tell a good lead from a waste of time
* Write cold emails that don’t sound like everyone else’s
* Join our team meetings, contribute, and track your work like the rest of us
* Learn what cloud and AI actually *do* for companies
* Start building a network in one of Europe’s fastest-growing tech sectors

No coffee runs. No busywork. You’ll be part of the team.


  
We’re not hiring your CV. We’re hiring how you think, how you communicate, and how you act when you don’t know the answer.


You’ll need:


* Clear, confident communication (in English — Swedish helps too)
* Hunger to learn and improve fast
* Interest in tech, sales, and what it really takes to build business
* The ability to follow up — with leads, with your team, with yourself
* A mindset that says, “Give me the ball.”

You're probably studying business, marketing, or tech — or maybe you're not. That’s less important than how you show up.


  
- * **Unpaid internship** based in our Stockholm office
	* Start date: First week of September, 90 days
	* Work closely with senior sales and local leadership — real feedback included**What you’ll leave with:**


	* Sales skills you won’t learn in a lecture hall
	* Actual experience with outreach, pipeline, and customer work
	* A reference worth something (if you do the work)
	* A shot at staying — or at least, knowing what kind of team you want next**How to apply:**  

Send us:



	* Your CV
	A short note answering one question:* ***Why should we take a bet on you?***Skip the formalities. We care what you bring, not how pretty your template is.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Marketing & Design Intern – Real Work, Real Output
description:
- Devoteam G Cloud is one of Google Cloud’s top partners in Europe. We work with cloud, AI, and security to help companies move faster and smarter.


In the Nordics, our marketing team works closely with sales, partners, and leadership. We’re small, hands-on, and focused. And when we bring interns in, we involve them in actual work — not side projects.


Interns here have gone on to full-time roles. We’re looking to do that again.

  
We’re hiring a **Marketing & Design Intern** for Fall **2025 (Sep–Nov)** in our Stockholm office.


This role is for someone who’s good with visual content and wants to learn how B2B marketing works in a fast-moving tech company.


You’ll work on:


* Visual assets for campaigns, sales enablement, and social channels
* Short video editing for LinkedIn, internal comms, and events
* Event materials (slides, banners, invites, etc.)
* Landing page visuals and simple web content updates
* Supporting live and digital campaigns across the Nordic region

You’ll be involved in real meetings, get regular feedback, and be expected to contribute from week one.


  
We’re looking for someone who:


* Is studying (or just finished) design, marketing, communications, or something related
* Has experience with Figma, Canva, Adobe, CapCut, or similar tools
* Has a basic understanding of digital campaigns, especially in B2B
* Can share some kind of portfolio or example work
* Is reliable, proactive, and communicates clearly
* Works well in English (Swedish, Norwegian, or Danish is a plus)

This internship is design- and execution-focused — not strategy or planning.


  
- * This is an **unpaid internship**
	* Based in our **Stockholm office** (Klara Norra Kyrkogata)
	* Internship runs from **February to May 2025** (flexible start/end dates)
	* You’ll be on-site 2–3 days per week, with flexibility**What you’ll gain:**


	* Real-world experience in content, design, and campaign execution
	* Exposure to one of Google’s top partners in Europe
	* A chance to build a strong reference and professional portfolio
	* A potential path to a full-time role (if the fit is right)**How to Apply**

Send us:



	* Your **CV**
	* A few **examples of your work** (portfolio, link, folder — doesn’t need to be fancy)
	* A short note on:
		+ Why this internship makes sense for you
		+ What kind of work you want to focus onThat’s it.
