title: Functional Safety Engineer
description:
**Functional Safety Engineer**
------------------------------

**The world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.**

**Your role**  

**The role is an integrated part of our System Safety Competence Center (SSCC) where a team of (System Safety Leaders) SSLs are together achieving the long-term goals of ensuring and delivering safe products within the System Safety area. System Safety includes Functional Safety (FUSA) as well as Safety of the Intended Functionality (SOTIF).**

***In this role you will play a key role in:***  

* **Drive the implementation of ISO 26262 & ISO 21448 and system safety processes across the organization.**
* **Develop and maintain system safety methods, tools, and best practices.**
* **Conduct awareness and training sessions to enhance the organization's understanding of system safety, principles, standards and way of working.**
* **Provide expert support and guidance on system safety processes to various departments, including engineers and managers.**
* **Perform confirmation reviews of system safety work products to ensure compliance with ISO 26262.**
* **Stay up to date with industry trends and advancements in system safety and international standards.**
**Your profile**  

* **Relevant educational background**
* **Minimum 4 years of experience in Functional Safety**
* **Good knowledge of systems engineering including embedded SW/HW in the automotive domain.**
* **Good knowledge of system safety engineering practices, safety standards and product safety.**
* **Deep knowledge in the automotive relevant system safety standards e.g. (ISO 26262, ISO 21448)**
* **Experience in risk assessment and analysis methodologies (HARA, FTA, FMEDA, FMEA) and processes/methods/tools for functional safety and safety of the intended functionality.**
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.**
**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.**  

**Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com**

title: Business Analyst (CPRD - Consumer Products, Retail & Distribution)
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**  



**Your role**
-------------

**We are looking for** **Business Analysts** **to join our** **CPRD** **(Consumer Products, Retail & Distribution) team in** **Malmö** **or** **Helsingborg** **, where you work with some of the leading a most well-known brands within the Retail industry. Domains is a growing practice of domain experts in Sweden with the aspiration to be the key trusted advisor accompanying our clients on their transformation journey to a more successful, sustainable, and innovative future, bringing in-depth business and technology as well as transformation expertise. By joining the team, you will have the opportunity to help shape the set-up, form the culture, and together decide on what is important to focus on initially and long term to create a dynamic, fun, and rewarding workplace.**  

  

**As a Business Analyst you play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and IT, advising and supporting our clients in their digital transformation. The responsibilities will vary; you will for example:**  

* **Act as Subject Matter Expert within your area of expertise**
* **Be part of developing, implementing, and improving business processes**
* **Design and implement technology solutions enabling business to take advantage of our customers current and emerging opportunities**
* **Be part of an Agile Delivery team and act as the Product Owners extended arm**
* **Be responsible for understanding business requirements and customer needs and translating these to user-stories**
* **Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals**
* **You advise our customers in the areas of supply chain management, logistics, warehouse management, enterprise resource management, customer relationship management and Loyalty in multi-channel commerce (including eCommerce)**
* **Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals**
* **With your individual strengths and your professional expertise, you will work on the further development of our service portfolio**

  

**Your profile**
----------------

* **You have 5+ years experience from the Consumer Products & Retail industry, especially Consumer Products.**
* **Knowledge of IT processes in retail (e.g. in the areas of SCM, Logistics, WMS, ERP, CRM, Loyalty, eCommerce).**
* **You can contextualize and apply trends and technologies such as Cloud, Agile, AI, Machine Learning, Data Science, Warehouse Automation and Robotics.**
* **Experience in requirements elicitation, process modelling and analysis and/or Product owner experience, understanding of systems lifecycles and design.**
* **Project Management experience and experience working as a consultant is also valued.**
* **You are characterized by your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation.**
* **You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of Swedish both spoken and written.**
* **Bachelor or academic background preferred (or equivalent experience) - preferably in computer science.**
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**
-----------------------------------------------------

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **Equip yourself with valuable certifications in the latest technologies.**

  

**The review of applications will resume on** **August 11th** **following summer break. This means that you can expect a response from Domains hiring team starting after this date, as the team return from summer break. The average time to hear back varies, but it's common to wait between one and two weeks depending on Domains team availability. Please mail dmn\_se\_recruitment@capgemini.com for more information.**

title: Data Scientist (GenAI & Analytics)
description:
**At Capgemini, you’ll have the opportunity to shape your career in a way that suits you, supported by a community of experts who inspire and empower you. We believe in reimagining what’s possible - using technology to build a more sustainable, inclusive world. Our Insights & Data team is at the forefront of this mission, delivering end-to-end Data & AI solutions across industries. With over 800 specialists in the Nordics, we leverage strategic partnerships with Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks, and Snowflake to scale Data & Analytics in the Cloud. Here, your expertise and perspective matter - join us in driving innovation and transforming industries with cutting-edge data solutions!**  

  

**Your role**  

**Are you passionate about shaping the future through data-driven insights? Imagine a role where you collaborate with clients, unravel complex challenges, and drive meaningful impact. As a Data Scientist, you will be at the forefront of innovation, using a modern tech stack to transform businesses and society.**  

  

***In this role you will play a key part in:***  

* **Data Alchemy: Dive into data wrangling, craft algorithms, and deploy solutions that matter and create insights.**
* **Wide Horizons: From predicting amusement park visitors to optimizing direct marketing, your canvas is vast.**
* **Cloud Magic: We’re all about Databricks and cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud).**
* **Also, you will also have the opportunity to apply theory, maths and science into real cases along with learning new technology - and why not pushing its boundaries.**
**Your profile**  

* **Experience: You’ve polished your skills as a Data Scientist, but still feel eager to continue to grow and take on new challenges, such as within GenAI, Agentic AI or Knowledge Graphs.**
* **Python Wizardry: Pandas, Scikit, PyTorch—these are your allies.**
* **Version Control: Git is your trusty sidekick.**
* **SQL Savvy: You speak the language of databases.**
* **Experienced in building AI solutions, from requirements gathering to analytic implementation.**
* **Pedagogical Flair: Explain Data Science like a pro.**
* **Academic Roots: Math, engineering, IT—your foundation matters.**
* **Language Mastery: You speak Swedish and English fluently—essential for client interactions.**

  

***Bonus Points for:***  

* **Knowledge graphs: Neo4j is our go-to tool.**
* **Databricks and Snowflake: Our secret sauce.**
* **MLOps Champion: CI/CD, continuous training—your playground.**
* **Stable Solutions: Kubernetes and Docker mastery.**
* **Business Acumen: Beyond code, grasp the bigger picture.**
* **Data Ecosystem: Know your Data Engineering and Business Intelligence.**

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **Our work culture is centered around collaboration and team spirit. You will have numerous opportunities to interact and socialize with colleagues at the office.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **We partner with names such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Databricks, which can equip you with valuable certifications in the latest technologies, if that is your ambition.**

title: WFM professionals interested in growing their careers with Legion
description:
At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community. Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.


**Your role**  

As a Workforce Management (WFM) professional, you’ll transition into a WFM TechnoFunctional Consultant role, joining our team to work with the Legion platform — an industry-leading, AI-native workforce management solution designed to maximize labor efficiency and employee engagement. You’ll start by receiving full training on Legion, and once trained, you’ll apply your existing experience with tools like Kronos, UKG, ATOSS, or Workday WFM to support and implement Legion-based solutions for our clients.


*In this role you will play a key role in:*

* Supporting the implementation and configuration of the Legion workforce management platform, building on your experience with tools like Kronos, UKG, ATOSS, Quinyx, Calabrio or Workday WFM
* Troubleshooting functional and technical issues across modules such as scheduling, timekeeping, accruals, and absence management
* Applying your understanding of workforce processes, including time capture, pay policies, and attendance to deliver effective solutions
* Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including developers and project managers, to ensure successful project outcomes

**Your profile**

* A minimum of 3 years of experience in WFM
* Proficiency in using WFM tools such as Kronos (Workforce Central and Dimensions), UKG PRO, ATOSS, and Workday
* Experience in Timekeeping, Pay Policies, Accruals, Scheduling, Forecasting, Absence Management, Access Management, Reporting and working with clock devices
* Participated in implementation projects, supported system upgrades, and provided ongoing system support
* Strong understanding of end-to-end HR processes, including hiring, time capture, and payroll
* Familiar with modules like Global Time Off, Advanced Scheduling, Accruals, Attestation, Activities, Devices, Display Profiles, Leave/Absence Setup, and Attendance
* Skilled in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to clock hardware
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.
* Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.
* A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.
* A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.

**Application**

In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis. As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.

title: Client Engineering Manager
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your role**  

You will drive the sales of Capgemini's full Engineering portfolio to senior and top management for our automotive clients. Additionally, you will be instrumental in guiding the ongoing transformation of Capgemini’s partnership with our clients, ensuring alignment with their strategic goals and fostering long-term collaboration.
  

If you are a dynamic professional with a strong background in high-level client engagement as well as business development, and if you are ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role that will shape the future of the company’s collaboration with our clients, Capgemini is looking forward to getting to know you!
  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*  

* Developing and implementing a sales strategy to drive growth in the engineering business with our automotive clients
* Building and maintaining strong, long-term relationships with key stakeholders, ensuring a deep understanding of their needs and positioning Capgemini as a trusted partner.
* Identifying and pursuing new business opportunities at the clients, leveraging capabilities to expand the scope of services and increase market share
* Shaping and refining Capgemini's Engineering portfolio by understanding and anticipating future growth areas in Engineering R&D and vehicle software, demonstrating strong expertise and thought leadership to ensure alignment with the evolving needs of the customers
* Working closely with engineering, delivery, and other internal teams to ensure seamless execution of projects.
* Conducting market research and competitive analysis to stay informed about industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activities.
* Acting as a champion for Capgemini's transformation initiatives, promoting innovative solutions and approaches that align with the evolving needs of the clients
* Deal shaping and sales orchestration responsibility
**Your Profile**  

* University degree within Business Administration, Engineering or similar
* Proven sales leadership experience within a larger global context
* We are looking for you with a lot of energy and who thrives in a fast pace.
* Strong knowledge and network within the Swedish Automotive industry
* You have strong leadership and negotiation abilities.
* Fluent in Swedish and English
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.

title: Enterprise Architect (Retail/CPRD)
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**  



**Job Description**
-------------------

**We are looking for a** **Managing Enterprise Architect** **to join our Domain** **Retail/CPRD** **team, where you will work as a stream lead at CIO/CTO level with some of the leading well-known brands within this industry. A Managing Enterprise Architect design, deliver and manage complete enterprise solutions and lead Capgemini operations relating to market development and/or service delivery excellence.**  

**Architects are at the heart of our business – they help our clients make sense of new and existing technologies and help them make informed decisions on how to exploit the current technology landscape to their best advantage. Often working as part of a team, our architects are experts in our world-class architectural approach and industry standards.**  

  

  

**You will:**  

* **Establish technology strategy and roadmap supporting current and future business capabilities**
* **Work on portfolio or program level addressing architectural concerns cross value streams**
* **Contribute to the strategic direction of the enterprise architecture and technology investments to maximize the ROI**
* **Shape and execute business transformation through technology**
* **Advise clients on technology solutions enabling them taking advantage of current and emerging opportunities**
* **Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals**
**Your profile**
----------------

* **15+ years’ experience from the Consumer Products & Retail industry and knowledge of IT processes in retail (e.g. in the areas of SCM, Logistics, WMS, ERP, CRM, Loyalty, eCommerce).**
* **10+ years’ experience working as an Enterprise Architect in large scale IT transformation programs.**
* **Deep knowledge in at least one of the following frameworks and standards - IT4IT, ITIL, ArchiMate and TOGAF.**
* **Experience in one (or more) of the three major public clouds - Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud or Amazon Web Services.**
* **You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of Swedish both spoken and written.**
* **Bachelor or academic background preferred (or equivalent experience) - preferably in computer science.**
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**
-----------------------------------------------------

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain a healthy work life balance.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **Equip yourself with valuable certifications in the latest technologies.**

  

**Additional information**
--------------------------

  

**The team called** **Domains** **is a key practice within Capgemini, a team of domain experts specialising in navigating our clients through the complexities and interdependencies that characterise large-scale technology-enabled transformation programmes. We are 3000 Domains consultants in Europe, 300 in the Nordics and 25 in Sweden. Our team of experienced Architects, Business Analysts and transformation managers, support our clients in designing, planning, and conducting digital transformations in their business. We’re striving to understand client’s business, current and future challenges, as well as their IT environment. We then propose, design, plan and help to implement new technological solutions or changes in the current IT landscape to improve or transform relevant business processes. We often define requirements for new IT projects that are later implemented by other Capgemini units or external partners.**

You will collaborate with major pharmaceutical clients to deliver patient-focused, compliant, and efficient digital solutions that modernize clinical trials and planning processes. In this role, you will lead cross-functional teams, manage project timelines, and ensure delivery meets regulatory requirements, industry standards, and business goals. Your ability to bridge business analysis, project management, and IT expertise will be crucial in driving success.
  

  

**Your Profile**  

* Degree in business, IT, engineering, or a related field.
* Extensive experience in project management within clinical IT and pharmaceutical domains.
* Proficiency with Agile methodologies, Scrum Master frameworks, and project management tools.
* Strong background in business analysis, requirements gathering, and stakeholder management.
* Experience leading large-scale transformation programs.
* Fluency in spoken and written English.

  

Meritorious skills
  

* Experience in life sciences or digital health solutions.
* Familiarity with clinical trial processes, consent workflows, and regulatory compliance (e.g., GDPR, GxP).
* Knowledge of clinical data management tools and processes.

  

You as a Person
  

We seek a proactive, broad-skilled project manager who thrives in a fast-paced environment, navigates complexity, and drives results. You should be adaptable, solutions-focused, and capable of balancing technical and business perspectives. Your leadership, communication skills, and ability to motivate teams will set you apart. At Capgemini Engineering, we value excellence, care, responsibility, dynamism, and innovation. title: Senior System Engineer - Medical Device
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your role**  

As a consultant in our life science team, your role will be a System engineer and work for medical devices clients, helping them with new product design and development. You will be creating product documentation right from the conceptual design to the product validation and all the way to product sustaining and handling of design changes.
  

  

As a System Engineer you will:
  

* Incorporate essential operating mechanisms of systems engineering of medical device design and adhere to medical device regulations.
* Participate in identifying and planning tasks, activities, and resource needs related to systems engineering.
* Leverages knowledge of technology, process, and/or therapy domains to drive solutions and product design realization from a systems perspective.
* Defines system requirements, architecture, and interfaces to meet product requirements, risk analysis and industry standards.
* Creates design concepts and research methodologies that best meet current and future customer & business needs for a product or process domain area.
* Conducts system design analysis to select key components and defines control methods; and coordinates build and design integration.
* Understands clinical and user needs and can apply to product realization.
* Works together to support product verification and validation planning, resolution of technical integration issues, and coordinate system testing.
* Demonstrates understanding of and adherence to FDA, ISO and IEC design control procedures, regulations, and standards.
* Drives Change Control Management records as Change owner and ensure timely closure.
* Creates and maintains Design History File elements.
* Conducts design reviews as part of the product development process to ensure customer requirements are met and the designs are manufacture-able, serviceable, and reliable.
* Successfully influences stakeholders and cross-functional team members within the project.
**Your profile**  

* A degree in Electrical/Mechanical/Biomedical Engineering (or) related engineering discipline with 6 plus of experience.
* Deep knowledge of systems engineering disciplines and related areas for medical devices (such as Electro-mechanical systems, embedded hardware and software).
* Knowledge of and/or experience of working accordance with regulations, guidelines, and standards such as: EU MDR, US FDA, IEC 60601, ISO 13485, ISO 14971 etc.
* The ability to communicate fluently in spoken and written English.
* A valid work permit for Sweden.

  

You as a person are:
  

* Curious and motivated by exciting challenges,
* A person who takes initiatives, is flexible and thrives in a dynamic environment,
* A person who finds it easy to cooperate and communicate with different groups of people,
* Genuinely interested in technology and problem solving, and
* Driven by challenges and personal development.

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.

title: Agil Projektledare/ Kravanalytiker
description:
***Att välja Capgemini innebär att välja ett företag där du får möjlighet att forma din karriär på det sätt du önskar. Här kommer att få stöd och inspiration inom en samarbetsvillig gemenskap med kollegor både lokalt och runt om i världen, som ständigt omdefinierar vad som är möjligt. Du kommer vara en del av området Cloud and Custom Application (C&CA) på Capgemini. Här kommer du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Cloud, Integration, AI och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi utvecklar skräddarsydda applikationer och hanterar komplexa integrationer för att maximera teknikens potential. Följ med oss och samarbeta med världens ledande organisationer för att realisera teknikens fulla värde genom innovativa lösningar***

**Om rollen**
-------------

**Som agil projektledare med bakgrund som kravanalytiker kommer du att verka i en nyckelroll inom agil utveckling, i regel som produktägare, release train engineer, scrum master eller verksamhetsutvecklare.**  

  

**Du kommer att verka på både organisations- och teamnivå med fokus på att förstå affärsbehoven och verksamheten samt driva förändring hos kunden.**  

**Projekten kan till exempel vara inom följande områden:**  



* **Realisera en förbättrad kundupplevelse i olika kanaler**
* **Formulera och driva kravarbete inom digital transformation**
* **Driva systemutvecklingsprojekt baserat på digitala plattformar**
* **Leda utveckling av skräddarsydda lösningar baserad på olika teknologier**
* **Effektivisera systemlandskap t ex genom nya plattformar eller migrering till cloud**

  

**Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.**

  

**Din profil**

* **Erfarenhet av att :**
	+ **Formulera och driva kravarbete inom** **verksamhetsprojekt med inslag av IT och systemutveckling**
	+ **Coacha och leda agila utvecklingsteam (ej hårdvara) i rollen som produktägare, release train engineer eller scrum master**
	+ **Hantera agila verktyg såsom Jira/Confluence eller liknande**
* **Universitetsexamen** **inom systemvetenskap, informatik eller ingenjörsutbildning**
* **Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska**

  

***… meriterande med certiferingar inom:***

* **PSM1 /PSM2**
* **SAFe -certifiering**
* **PMI, IPMA**
* **IREB, REQB eller motsvarande**

  

**Vad vi tror kommer att få dig att trivas**

* **En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kundnöjdhet. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste trenderna och vara omgiven av skickliga kollegor.**
* **På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med högt kundfokus, en samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerlig lärande och utveckling.**
* **Vårt team i Stockholm består av medarbetare som levererar till publika och privata sektorn. Vi erbjuder även ett lokalt och internationellt nätverk inom Agile Delivery i Norden och världen vilket innebär att det alltid finns någon som kan hjälpa dig i det dagliga arbetet om du behöver stöd i dina leveranser.**
* **Som anställd hos oss blir du en del av en vass, teknik- och affärsfokuserad gemenskap, Här kan du bl.a välja mellan 250 000 kurser som täcker det mesta, inkl. certifieringar.﻿**
* **Du kommer kontinuerligt att ha en dialog med din teamchef om hur du utvecklas avseende uppdrag, utbildningar och kundnöjdhet**
* **Våra värderingar:** **Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Freedom, Team spirit, Modesty and Fun**
**Ansökan**  



* **Vi arbetar med löpande urval så vänta inte - skicka in din ansökan redan idag. Vi ser framemot din ansökan och att du vill bli en del av vår fortsatta resa!**
* **Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.**

**Om Capgemini**  

**Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want |** **www.capgemini.com**  

  

**#LI-RH1**

title: Data Governance Lead
description:
**At Capgemini, you’ll have the opportunity to shape your career in a way that suits you, supported by a community of experts who inspire and empower you. We believe in reimagining what’s possible - using technology to build a more sustainable, inclusive world. Our Insights & Data team is at the forefront of this mission, delivering end-to-end Data & AI solutions across industries. With over 800 specialists in the Nordics, we leverage strategic partnerships with Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks, and Snowflake to scale Data & Analytics in the Cloud. Here, your expertise and perspective matter - join us in driving innovation and transforming industries with cutting-edge data solutions!**  

  

**Your role**  

**We are looking for a Data Governance Lead to join our organization. This role is critical in ensuring the effective management, integrity, security, and utilization of data across the enterprise. At Capgemini, we offer a flexible work environment, however, for your first assignment you are required to work on-site and travel to Copenhagen at least 50% of your time.**  

  

***In this role you will play a key part in:***  

* **Implementing, facilitating and driving, you will also be working through others and communicating to management. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and implement data management policies, standards, and best practices aligned with business objectives.**
* **Adjustment and assignment of data roles, data quality rules set up, data modelling and more.**
* **Designing, implementing, and maintaining data governance frameworks, policies, and tools to ensure compliance, quality, and security of data.**
* **Develop, implement, and maintain a data governance framework that ensures data accuracy, integrity, and security across the organization.**
* **Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) and ensure that data usage is in line with corporate policies and external legal requirements.**
* **Manage data governance tools and technologies, including metadata management, data lineage, and data quality solutions.**
**Your profile**  

* **Eligibility to work in the EU**
* **Strong stakeholder management and communication skills.**
* **Ability to navigate a complex organization, as well as having a pragmatic approach in order to move things forward.**
* **Proven experience in data governance, data management, or data architecture roles.**
* **Strong understanding of data governance frameworks and industry best practices.**
* **Experience with data governance tools such as Collibra, Alation, Informatica, or other metadata management solutions.**
* **Familiarity with data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) and experience in ensuring regulatory compliance.**
* **Strong skills in data quality management, including data cleansing, data lineage, and data profiling.**
* **Solid understanding of data security practices, including access controls, encryption, and audit logging.**
* **Excellent ability to work with large datasets, ensuring accuracy, consistency, and reliability of data.**
* **Knowledge of database systems, data lakes, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.**
* **Bachelor's degree in data science, Analytics, Business, or related field. Advanced degrees or certifications are a plus.**

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* **We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.**
* **Our work culture is centered around collaboration and team spirit. You will have numerous opportunities to interact and socialize with colleagues at the office.**
* **At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.**
* **We partner with names such as Google, Microsoft, Amazon and Databricks, which can equip you with valuable certifications in the latest technologies, if that is your ambition.**

  

**Application**  

**Ready to shape the future? Feel free to ask for more details!**  

  

***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.*** **#LI-AKARLSSON**

title: Nordics ISCO Go to Market Lead
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. As a leader in Intelligent Supply Chain Operations (ISCO), we help top organizations in consumer products, manufacturing, and life sciences unlock the power of technology. Join us and help shape the future.**

**Your role**  

  

**The Nordics ISCO Go To Market (GTM) Lead is a leadership role responsible for driving opportunity origination and closure for ISCO services to clients in Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. The role will involve working with colleagues within ISCO, Business Services, local Market Units, Invent, Engineering and third-party partners to originate, win and close new business opportunities.**  

  

***In this position you will play a key role in:***  

  



* **Go To Market Strategy: In driving ISCO revenue growth in the Nordics by defining and executing the GTM strategy, targeting key clients, fostering strategic partnerships, and continuously optimizing performance through data-driven insights.**
* **Sales Capture Leadership: Leading end-to-end ISCO sales cycles by engaging senior clients, managing internal governance, developing proposals, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver compelling, winning solutions.**
* **Practice Development: Providing market and client insights to enhance ISCO offerings, while representing Capgemini in industry and advisory forums to strengthen thought leadership and visibility.**
* **Tracking and driving sales performance through key metrics including qualified pipeline, bookings, revenue, contribution margin, and win rate.**

**Your profile**  

  



* **Director-level supply chain leader with end-to-end expertise across planning, fulfillment, procurement and data management, blending client-side and provider-side operations, transformation and advisory experience.**
* **Experience in business development and sales within business services, technology or consulting. Strong commercial acumen, solution development expertise, risk management skills, and the ability to navigate ambiguity and tailor ISCO offerings to client needs.**
* **Extensive experience in business transformation across consumer products, industrial manufacturing, and life sciences, with a strong track record in multinational environments across the Nordics and Northern Europe.**
* **Effective communicator with the ability to build trusted relationships across senior and mid-level stakeholders, skilled in delivering compelling content, collaborating in global matrixed environments, and proficient in Microsoft Office tools.**
* **Education: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant business or technical field preferred; Master’s degree in business, engineering, or supply chain disciplines highly desirable.**
* **Proficient in a Nordic language, enabling effective communication across regional stakeholders and markets.**

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

  



* **You get to work with major customers in exciting and varied roles, giving you the opportunity to develop both personally and professionally.**
* **We keep everyone connected, with learning activities and social events. With the freedom to grow, you get access to a wide range of our global comprehensive training programs.**
* **We focus on inclusion and embrace and empower talent in all its diverse forms and origins**
* **We are valuing work-life balance with flexible working arrangements in order for you to balance your work life with your personal life.**

**As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.**

title: Cloud Arkitekt
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**OM ROLLEN**

**Vill du vara med och forma framtidens molnlösningar?**

**Du blir en del av Capgeminis Cloud & Infrastructure Services (CIS)-enhet med fokus på projekt- och konsulttjänster i Norden. Vårt mål är att erbjuda kunder helhetslösningar inom Cloud och vi erbjuder en mängd olika tjänster till våra kunder, från strategisk rådgivning till projektgenomförande.**

**Som Cloud Arkitekt kommer du att:**

* **Designa och implementera skalbara, säkra och kostnadseffektiva molnarkitektur, som uppfyller affärsbehoven**
* **Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att samla in krav, definiera tekniska specifikationer och utveckla molnlösningar, som är i linje med affärsmålen och främjar hållbarhet (GreenOps)**
* **Utvärdera molntekniker och tjänster för att rekommendera bästa praxis och lösningar för att optimera prestanda, tillförlitlighet och skalbarhet**
* **Designa och distribuera molninfrastruktur med hjälp av ledande plattformar som AWS, Azure och/eller GCP**
* **Utveckla och underhålla dokumentation, diagram och riktlinjer för moln-arkitektur**
* **Ge tekniskt ledarskap och mentorskap till juniora teammedlemmar, vilket främjar en kultur av kontinuerligt lärande och tillväxt**
* **Hålla dig uppdaterad gällande teknologier och branschtrender för att driva innovation och förbättra våra molnerbjudanden**
* **Arbeta nära kunder, partners och andra affärsenheter för att utveckla och genomföra innovativa och konkurrenskraftiga lösningar/projekt för nya och befintliga kunder genom att utnyttja dina tidigare erfarenheter av att implementera molnlösningar**

**DIN PROFIL**

* **Erfarenhet av att skapa högtillgängliga molninfrastrukturlösningar för stora organisationer**
* **Gedigen kunskap om funktioner och möjligheter hos AWS, Azure och/eller GCP**
* **God förståelse för cloud-native arkitektur, mikrotjänster, containerisering och serverlös databehandling**
* **Erfarenhet av verktyg för Infrastructure as Code (IaC), såsom Terraform eller CloudFormation**
* **Erfarenhet av att skapa greenfield-lösningar och implementera landningszoner enligt bästa praxis**
* **Erfarenhet av att snabbt utvärdera teknisk genomförbarhet och utveckla förslag för migrering av workloads till AWS, Azure och/eller GCP**
* **Kunskap om praxis och verktyg för ekonomisk drift (FinOps) för optimering och hantering av molnkostnader**
* **Certifieringar såsom AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert eller Google Professional Cloud Architect är meriterande**
* **Erfarenhet av nätverksintegration med AWS Direct Connect eller Azure Express Route samt nätverksdesign (WAN/LAN/brandväggar)**
* **Förståelse för hybridmolnlösningar och erfarenhet av att integrera offentligt moln i traditionella hosting-/leveransmodeller**
* **Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift** **I**

***Observera att identitets- och bakgrundskontroller kan genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.*** ***Du kan också behöva passera SC Security Clearance om du är framgångsrik i denna rekryteringsprocess, vilket då kommer att vara ett villkor för att åta dig rollen.*** **-J** **F**

title: Mechanical Engineer within Medical Technology
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your Role**  

Capgemini Engineering is seeking a highly skilled Mechanical Engineer to join our dynamic team. This role emphasizes CAD design using Creo software. In this role, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring the delivery of innovative, compliant, and CAD models & engineering drawings, that meets standards for medical device industry.
  

  

* Mechanical Product Development: Lead the end-to-end mechanical product development process for medical devices, including the conceptualization, CAD design, and validation of models in close collaboration with production and quality teams.
* Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with prototype testing, production, and quality teams, building strong rapport to effectively deliver high-intensity, fast-paced project outcomes when required.
* Quality Management & Change Management Systems: Manage quality documentation and approval workflows in compliance with ISO 13485 and FDA QSR. Demonstrated expertise in engineering change requests (ECRs), change orders (COs), and formal workflow approval processes in QMS tools.
* Design Specifications & Controls: Define performance criteria, select appropriate materials, and ensure adherence to medical device design controls in compliance with regulatory standards.
* Process Improvement & Feasibility: Identify areas for continuous improvement in technical CAD drawings, processes, and technologies, while conducting detailed feasibility studies, material evaluations, and performance testing.
* Production Readiness & Regulatory Compliance: Supervise production activities to ensure alignment with design-for-manufacturability (DFM) principles, while ensuring all CAD solutions comply with relevant regulatory frameworks and industry standards.

  

**Your profile**  

* Educational Background: Master’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or a related field.
* At least five years of professional experience, with two to three years in medical device development preferred.
* Proficiency in mechanical design for devices and plastic components, with expertise in part design, sheet metal design principles and GD&T.
* Demonstrated ability to work independently and collaborate effectively with teams remotely, managing tasks across geographically diverse locations.

  

Technical Skills:
  

* Advanced proficiency in 3D modelling using CREO (mandatory)
* In-depth knowledge of robust design processes and GD&T
* Fluent in English, with the ability to collaborate effectively across diverse cultural settings and international teams

  

Position may be hybrid, offering flexibility between on-site and remote work based on assignment needs. Willingness and flexibility to travel as required
  

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.

  

Join us and get the future you want!

title: Salesforce Architect
description:
Capgemini har sedan 2007 varit en strategisk partner med Salesforce, som är ledande i Europa inom strategi, design, implementation och förvaltning av innovativa Salesforce-lösningar. Tillsammans med våra kunder levererar vi på Capgemini helhetslösningar inom hela Salesforce-plattformen, vi är en multi-cloud partner och jobbar bland annat med Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud och Experience Cloud. Vi är en av nordens största aktörer inom Salesforce, vilket ger oss möjligheten att arbeta med spännande uppdrag tillsammans med andra framstående experter inom området.
**Om rollen****Vi söker en erfaren Salesforce arkitekt till vårt team på Kungsholmen i centrala Stockholm. I denna nyckelroll kommer du att vara en drivande kraft i att designa, utveckla och implementera hållbara och skalbara Salesforce-lösningar för våra kunder. Du arbetar nära både kunder och interna team i en agil miljö, där du fungerar som teknisk expert och rådgivare inom Salesforce-plattformen.****Som arkitekt ansvarar du för att säkerställa att våra lösningar möter både affärsbehov och tekniska krav. Du kommer att spela en central roll i våra kunders digitala transformationsresor och bidra till att forma framtidens CRM-lösningar. Dessutom blir du en aktiv del av vår interna Salesforce Guild, där vi tillsammans utvecklar kompetens, delar erfarenheter och driver innovation inom plattformen.****Din profil*** **5+ års erfarenhet som Salesforce utvecklare där du har arbetat med både anpassad utveckling och övergripande konfigurering av Salesforce i antingen ett eller flera projekt.**
* **Erfarenhet inom Apex, LWC och JavaScript.**
* **God förståelse för Salesforce-integrationsmönster (REST/SOAP API, middleware som MuleSoft, etc.)**
* **Djupgående kunskap om Salesforce-plattformen (Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Experience Cloud, m.fl.)**
* **Erfarenhet av datamodellering och säkerhetsarkitektur inom Salesforce.**
* **Erfarenhet av att agera rådgivare gentemot kunder och intressenter.**
* **Kunskap inom IAM/Release Lifecycle.**
* **Certifieringar som Salesforce Application Architect och/eller System Architect.**
**Meriterande*** **Erfarenhet av Industry Clouds**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas*** **Möjlighet till utbildning och certifiering för dig som vill ligga i framkant.**
* **Generöst friskvårdsbidrag, sjukvårdsförsäkring & tjänstepension.**
* **Flexibla arbetsförhållanden & Work-from-Home Policy.**

title: AWS Architect
description:
**Är du en erfaren AWS-expert som brinner för att använda de senaste molntjänsterna och teknikerna? Vårt AWS-team växer och vi söker efter dig som är; AWS Architect, AWS Specialist, AWS Solution Architect, AWS System Architect, Tech Lead, eller AWS DevSecOps Developer.**  



**Capgemini söker passionerade AWS-experter, DevSecOps-ingenjörer samt Cloud Engineers för att ansluta sig till vårt dynamiska team i** **Malmö.** **Ta din karriär till nästa nivå med oss och arbeta med banbrytande projekt!**  

  

**Vill du i din nästa arbetsroll ha möjlighet att påverka, bidra och leda oss framåt på nordisk nivå? Oavsett om du drivs av tekniskt hands-on arbete, ta de stora besluten eller leda experterna så har vi möjligheter för dig!**  

  

**Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa och mångsidiga projekt som använder de senaste AWS-teknologierna, GenAI och moderna frameworks. Vi erbjuder oändliga möjligheter för lärande och utveckling för att ta din karriär till nya höjder, med karriärvägar för arkitekter, tech leads, juniorer, gurus och alla däremellan. #GetTheFutureYouWant. Du blir en del av en vänlig och inkluderande miljö som firar mångfald och främjar samarbete. Dessutom erbjuder vi flexibla arbetstider som främjar en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och fritid.**  



**Om rollen**  

***Exempel på områden som du kan komma att arbeta med:***

* **Leda mjukvaruleveranser på AWS.**
* **Designa och implementera robusta och skalbara AWS-lösningar.**
* **Säkerställ säkerhet och effektivitet i våra DevSecOps-processer, AIOps och CI/CD pipelines med AWS.**
* **Lösningsarkitektur för större system och microservicesarkitektur på AWS.**
* **Bygg och underhåll data pipelines och datalager i AWS.**
* **Hantera och optimera molninfrastrukturen för våra kunder.**

**Din profil**

* **Minst tre års erfarenhet av AWS-tjänster.**
* **Kunskap om programmering eller skriptspråk.**
* **Erfarenhet av att arbeta med tjänster som exempelvis; AWS SageMaker, AWS Glue, AWS Security Hub, AWS API Gateway, AWS ECS, EWS Lamdba, AWS CodePipeline, AWS Step Functions.**
* **Förståelse för bästa praxis inom molnarkitektur och säkerhet.**
* **Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift då båda språken kommer användas i det dagliga arbetet.**

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**

* **Du kommer att arbeta med de nyaste teknikerna och kompetensväxla i samarbeten med andra specialister.**
* **Du får också chansen att påverka några av världens största bolag och bidra till att bygga AWS-kapabilitet på nordisk nivå.**
* **Du kommer att utvecklas via våra utbildningar och tilldelas värdefulla certifieringar inom de senaste teknologierna, som exempelvis AI, AWS eller Microsoft Azure.**
* **Nyttja Capgeminis olika fokusområden, såsom Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club och Art club.**
* **Vi erbjuder generöst friskvårdsbidrag och tjänstepension, bonusprogram, företagshälsovård och sjukvårdsförsäkring.**
* **En rolig och engagerande arbetsplats där du kan njuta av teambyggande aktiviteter, sociala evenemang med en härlig kontorskultur.**
**Ansökan**  

**Redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Ansök nu och bli en del av Capgemini Sveriges innovativa AWS-team! Just nu har vi semesterperiod och hoppas även du njuter av en fin sommar! Vi kommer jobba löpande i denna rekryteringsprocess men vill nämna att det under semesterperiod kan dröja lite längre än vanligt i återkopplingen till dig som valt att söka. Stort tack för ditt tålamod!**

title: ServiceNow Consultant
description:
**Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.**

**YOUR ROLE**  

**In this role you can expect to:**

* **Work closely with customers to research, design, develop and deliver innovative solutions to improve their business processes**
* **Assists ServiceNow Business Analyst in estimating release level of effort. Makes recommendations which yield a more cost-effective product and better streamlined workflows**
* **Responsible for the overall design of the application and enable innovative solutions to drive process automation across IT Services on ServiceNow Platform**
* **Assist or drive design workshops across projects to work with other IT streams to improve the platform adoption and user experience of ServiceNow**
* **Ability to prepare prototypes in demo instances for proposed solutions**
* **Analyzing ServiceNow releases and upgrades and how it impacts the current features and applications in use**
* **Design and architect ServiceNow CMDB, discovery jobs, and automation workflows and flow using ServiceNow Orchestrator**
* **Create ServiceNow reports and dashboards**
* **Support with Pre-Sales activities and responding to RFP’s and RFI’s**
* **Help and support Junior Consultants to grow within the ServiceNow area**  

  

**YOUR PROFILE**
* **Have several years of technical and functional experience with ITIL Service Management processes**
* **Have several years of experience designing, developing, testing, implementing and maintaining ServiceNow platform and integrations**
* **ServiceNow Certified System Administrator**
* **Additional ServiceNow suite certifications is a plus**
* **Exceptional interpersonal, communication, facilitation and influencing skills**
* **Requires critical thinking skills, decisive judgment and the ability to work with minimal supervision**
* **Have strong supplier management skills to help provide direction and ensure quality of services**
* **Experience in managing an application, Agile/Scrum skills, ITIL Practitioner**
* **Demonstrable experience with the use of MS Office applications: Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint, SharePoint, Project, Visio.**
* **Knowledge of web-based systems architecture, service-based architecture, enterprise application architecture and worked integration with other applications**
* **Experience in designing/developing/configuring architecture for ServiceNow modules/features as a minimum (ITSM, ITOM, HR, SAM, ITBM, CSM, FSM, SecOps, GRC, Orchestration)**
* **Experience within Multi Service Provider (MSP) solutioning based on ServiceNow**
* **Understanding of the key technologies relevant to the ServiceNow integration solutions including: SSO, SAML, SSL, Web Services, LDAP, JDBC, ODBC, REST, SCP, FTPS, JSON, SOAP**
* **General Understanding of Database technologies such as SQL, MySQL, Oracle**
* **Experience in planning and execution of ServiceNow upgrades**
* **ITIL Certified**
* **Knowledge in Swedish and a valid working permit for Sweden are required**

***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted. You might also be required to pass through SC Security Clearance if you are successful in this recruitment process, which will then be a condition of undertaking the role.***

**#LI-JF1**

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.**

title: Test Automation Engineer
description:
**Att välja Capgemini innebär att du får en arbetsplats där du kan #GetTheFutureYouWant. Här blir du en del av en stödjande och inspirerande gemenskap med engagerade kollegor världen över. Inom Cloud and Custom Applications (C&CA) på Capgemini arbetar du med de senaste teknologierna inom Cloud, Integration, AI och mjukvaruutveckling. Vi utvecklar skräddarsydda applikationer och hanterar komplexa integrationer för att maximera teknikens potential – med målet att skapa en mer hållbar och inkluderande framtid. Följ med oss och samarbeta med världens ledande organisationer för att realisera teknikens fulla värde genom innovativa lösningar och molntransformation.**

  

**Om rollen**  

**Som Test Automation Engineer kommer du att arbeta tillsammans med kunder i spännande och betydelsefulla projekt som formar framtidens digitala transformation.**  

  

***I denna position kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i:***  



* **Designa och implementera testautomationslösningar för att säkerställa mjukvarukvalitet och tillförlitlighet**
* **Fungera som en betrodd rådgivare och vägleda kunder om testautomationsstrategier och bästa praxis**
* **Samarbeta med tvärfunktionella team för att utveckla effektiva och skalbara lösningar**
* **Utveckla användarcentrerade testautomationslösningar som förbättrar slutanvändarens upplevelse och säkerställer tillförlitlighet, användbarhet och effektivitet i automatiserade tester**

  

**Din profil**

* **4+ års erfarenhet i en relevant roll (t.ex. Test Automation, QA-Engineer eller Software Engineer med testautomationsansvar)**
* **Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska**
* **Praktisk erfarenhet av testautomationsverktyg och ramverk (t.ex. Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, Cypress, Playwright). Kunskap om testhanterings- och felhanteringsverktyg (Jira, HP ALM)**
* **Färdighet i skript- och programmeringsspråk (t.ex. Java, Python, C#, Javascript)**

  

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**

* **På Capgemini är arbete mer än bara ett jobb – det är en plats att trivas, växa och göra verklig skillnad. Med starkt fokus på balans mellan arbete och privatliv, välbefinnande och inkludering, kommer du att vara en del av en global gemenskap av 340 000 kollegor.**
* **Här är du i förarsätet för din karriär – #GetTheFutureYouWant är vårt åtagande att ge dig möjlighet att forma din framtid. Från AI och moln till digital ingenjörskonst, kommer du att arbeta med banbrytande projekt som transformerar företag och skapar en mer hållbar och inkluderande värld.**
* **Livet på Capgemini är givande, spännande och fyllt med möjligheter att lära, utmana dig själv och samarbeta med briljanta sinnen. Redo att #GetTheFutureYouWant? Välkommen! Låt oss göra det tillsammans.**

  

**Ansökan**  

**Redo att starta ett nytt kapitel i din karriär? Vi kan knappt vänta på att höra från dig! Ansök idag – vi hanterar ansökningar löpande. Under processen får du chansen att besöka vårt kontor, prata med rekryterande chef och självklart ställa alla dina nyfikna frågor till vår rekryterare. Vi lovar att göra din resa mot jobbet så smidig och givande som möjligt. Är du den vi söker? Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!**

title: SAP Senior Consultant (Demand to Supply)
description:
**At PBS Nordics, a Capgemini business unit, we empower individuals to shape their careers within a collaborative global community.**

**Specializing in ERP transformation services for both public and private sectors, PBS Nordics delivers tailored solutions using top ERP systems like SAP, Microsoft Dynamics, and IFS. With a strong Nordic presence and a diverse global client portfolio, we guide organizations through seamless ERP transformations, driving operational excellence and strategic growth.**

**Your role**  

**As an SAP Consultant, you will be responsible for optimizing end-to-end processes through SAP S/4 HANA, helping us improve efficiency, reduce costs, and deliver superior customer service. If you have a track record of implementing and supporting SAP solutions and are a true Team Player that is passionate about adding value to clients and want to advance your career, this could be the role for you!**  

  

***In this role you will play a key role in:***

* **Lead the design, configuration, and implementation of SAP S/4HANA, ensuring it aligns with business requirements and best practices.**
* **Provide strategic advice and expertise to clients on SAP S/4HANA Integrated Business Planning (IBP), Production Planning and Detailed Scheduling (PP/DS), Manufacturing (PP), Digital Manufacturing (DM), Extended Warehouse Management (EWM), Transportation Management (TM), Quality Management (QM) and Enterprise Asset Management (EAM/PM).**
* **Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate with other SAP functional areas and external systems.**
* **Lead, Guide and Support junior consultants, fostering their professional growth and ensuring high-quality project delivery.**
* **Stay updated with industry trends and the latest developments in SAP S/4HANA and emerging technologies to continuously enhance service delivery.**

**Your profile**

* **Proven experience as an SAP Consultant, with at least 5 years of hands-on experience and track record in implementing and supporting SAP Solutions in a complex environment.**
* **Experience in a minimum of one S/4 transformation, SAP certification in relevant area and have a strong understanding of Supply Chain Management processes and best practices.**
* **Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment and strong communication skills, both written and verbal.**

***Note: Nordic-based and fluency in English; proficiency in Swedish is preferred. Open to travel.*** ***#LI-JD1***  

  

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* **A challenging career in a vibrant environment with access to extensive training, a global network of experts and an innovative culture that promotes learning, growth, and shared success.**
* **Opportunities to work on real-world problems and help transform leading organizations.**
* **A company culture driven by core values: Honesty, Trust, Freedom, Team Spirit, Modesty, Fun, and Boldness.**
* **A strong commitment to inclusion, diversity, and supporting the whole person.**

  

**Application**  

***In this recruitment process, we review applications and hire on an ongoing basis.*** ***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.***

**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries.**  

  

**With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.**

title: Business Manager (automotive)
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.


**Your role**  

As our new Business Manager, you will be responsible for some of our biggest Swedish Automotive OEMs customers in Gothenburg, managing and developing existing and new relationships.
  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*  

* Sales responsibility for targeted clients within the Automotive area
* Business development and revenue growth
* Building and maintaining client relations locally
* Analyze the local market and be continuously updated on the latest trends
* Optimize local bench and staff our employees on relevant projects
* Anticipate the end of contracts and resources reallocation
* Responsible to find the right assignment for the right competence, using portals, email or in direct contact with the customer
**Your profile**  

* University degree within Business Administration, Engineering or similar
* Experience from a leading role within sales or/and business development
* We are looking for you with a lot of energy and who thrives in a fast pace
* Strong knowledge and network within the Swedish (R&D/engineering) Automotive industry
* You have strong leadership and negotiation abilities
* Fluent in Swedish and/or English
**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**  

* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.

title: AWS Architect
description:
Är du en erfaren AWS-expert som brinner för att använda de senaste molntjänsterna och teknikerna? Vårt AWS-team växer och vi söker efter dig som är; AWS Architect, AWS Specialist, AWS Solution Architect, AWS System Architect, Tech Lead, eller AWS DevSecOps Developer.  

  



Capgemini söker passionerade AWS-experter, DevSecOps-ingenjörer samt Cloud Engineers för att ansluta sig till vårt dynamiska team i **Stockholm** . Ta din karriär till nästa nivå med oss och arbeta med banbrytande projekt!
  

  

Vill du i din nästa arbetsroll ha möjlighet att påverka, bidra och leda oss framåt på nordisk nivå? Oavsett om du drivs av tekniskt hands-on arbete, ta de stora besluten eller leda experterna så har vi möjligheter för dig!
  

  

Hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa och mångsidiga projekt som använder de senaste AWS-teknologierna, GenAI och moderna frameworks. Vi erbjuder oändliga möjligheter för lärande och utveckling för att ta din karriär till nya höjder, med karriärvägar för arkitekter, tech leads, juniorer, gurus och alla däremellan. #GetTheFutureYouWant. Du blir en del av en vänlig och inkluderande miljö som firar mångfald och främjar samarbete. Dessutom erbjuder vi flexibla arbetstider som främjar en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och fritid.  

  



**Om rollen**  

*Exempel på områden som du kan komma att arbeta med:*

* Leda mjukvaruleveranser på AWS.
* Designa och implementera robusta och skalbara AWS-lösningar.
* Säkerställ säkerhet och effektivitet i våra DevSecOps-processer, AIOps och CI/CD pipelines med AWS.
* Lösningsarkitektur för större system och microservicesarkitektur på AWS.
* Bygg och underhåll data pipelines och datalager i AWS.
Hantera och optimera molninfrastrukturen för våra kunder.  
* 

**Din profil**

* Minst tre års erfarenhet av AWS-tjänster.
* Kunskap om programmering eller skriptspråk.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med tjänster som exempelvis; AWS SageMaker, AWS Glue, AWS Security Hub, AWS API Gateway, AWS ECS, EWS Lamdba, AWS CodePipeline, AWS Step Functions.
* Förståelse för bästa praxis inom molnarkitektur och säkerhet.
Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift då båda språken kommer användas i det dagliga arbetet.  
* 

**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas**

* Du kommer att arbeta med de nyaste teknikerna och kompetensväxla i samarbeten med andra specialister.
* Du får också chansen att påverka några av världens största bolag och bidra till att bygga AWS-kapabilitet på nordisk nivå.
* Du kommer att utvecklas via våra utbildningar och tilldelas värdefulla certifieringar inom de senaste teknologierna, som exempelvis AI, AWS eller Microsoft Azure.
* Nyttja Capgeminis olika fokusområden, såsom Diversity and Inclusion, Sustainability, Wellness club och Art club.
* Vi erbjuder generöst friskvårdsbidrag och tjänstepension, bonusprogram, företagshälsovård och sjukvårdsförsäkring.
En rolig och engagerande arbetsplats där du kan njuta av teambyggande aktiviteter, sociala evenemang med en härlig kontorskultur.  
* 
**Ansökan**  

Redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Ansök nu och bli en del av Capgemini Sveriges innovativa AWS-team! Just nu har vi semesterperiod och hoppas även du njuter av en fin sommar! Vi kommer jobba löpande i denna rekryteringsprocess men vill nämna att det under semesterperiod kan dröja lite längre än vanligt i återkopplingen till dig som valt att söka. Stort tack för ditt tålamod!
  

#LI-ET1


**Om Capgemini**  

Hos våra kunder arbetar vi i leveranser som kan ha bland annat AWS, GCP, Azure, AliCloud, Java, Go/Golang, Python, Kotlin, Node, HTML, TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, Java, CloudFormation, Terraform, Docker, Kafka, React, Angular, Vue, Bash, Spring, GenAI, GraphQL, Backstage, Kubernetes, LLM, RAG, Copilot, GitHub Actions, SonarQube, BlackDuck, Apache Beam, Kong, Jenkins, Apigee, OpenShift, Ansible, DevSecOps, cloud architecture, cloud assessments, integration, Snowflake, Elastic Search, Grafana, Kibana, Splunk, Databricks, HelmChart, CloudFoundry.
  

  

Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda övergången till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, generativ AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2024 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,1 miljarder euro.
  

  

Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com
